anya-e0803n5:3: Vippakiṇṇakathā ettha, evaṁ vutte na hessati;
anya-e0803n5:7_0: Puriso, purisā. Purisaṁ, purise. Purisena, purisehi, purisebhi. Purisassa, purisānaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:7_1: Purisā, purisasmā, purisamhā, purisehi, purisebhi. Purisassa, purisānaṁ. Purise,
anya-e0803n5:7_2: purisasmiṁ, purisamhi, purisesu. Bho purisa, bhavanto purisā.
anya-e0803n5:8_0: Ayamāyasmatā mahākaccānena pabhinnapaṭisambhidena katasmā niruttipiṭakato uddharito
anya-e0803n5:8_2: paccattavacanādīni bhavanti. Taṁ yathā? Puriso tiṭṭhati, purisā tiṭṭhanti. Tatra
anya-e0803n5:8_3: purisoti purisavacane ekavacane paccattavacanaṁ bhavati, purisāti purisavacane puthuvacane
anya-e0803n5:9: Purisaṁ passati, purise passati. Tatra purisanti purisavacane ekavacane upayogavacanaṁ bhavati, puriseti purisavacane puthuvacane upayogavacanaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0803n5:10_0: Purisena kataṁ, purisehi kataṁ, purisebhi kataṁ. Tatra purisenāti purisavacane ekavacane
anya-e0803n5:10_1: karaṇavacanaṁ bhavati, purisehi, purisebhīti purisavacane puthuvacane karaṇavacanaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0803n5:11: Purisassa dīyate, purisānaṁ dīyate. Tatra purisassāti purisavacane ekavacane sampadānavacanaṁ bhavati, purisānanti purisavacane puthuvacane sampadānavacanaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0803n5:12_0: Purisā nissaṭaṁ, purisasmā nissaṭaṁ, purisamhā nissaṭaṁ, purisehi nissaṭaṁ, purisebhi
anya-e0803n5:12_1: nissaṭaṁ. Tatra purisāti purisavacane ekavacane nissakkavacanaṁ bhavati. Purisasmāti…pe…
anya-e0803n5:12_2: purisamhāti purisavacane ekavacane nissakkavacanaṁ bhavati, purisehi, purisebhīti
anya-e0803n5:13: Purisassa pariggaho, purisānaṁ pariggaho. Tatra purisassāti purisavacane ekavacane sāmivacanaṁ bhavati, purisānanti purisavacane puthuvacane sāmivacanaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0803n5:14_0: Purise patiṭṭhitaṁ, purisasmiṁ patiṭṭhitaṁ, purisamhi patiṭṭhitaṁ, purisesu patiṭṭhitaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:14_1: Tatra puriseti purisavacane ekavacane bhummavacanaṁ bhavati, purisasminti…pe… purisamhīti…pe…
anya-e0803n5:15_0: Bho purisa tiṭṭha, bhavanto purisā tiṭṭhatha. Tatra bho purisaiti purisavacane ekavacane
anya-e0803n5:15_1: ālapanaṁ bhavati, bhavanto purisāiti purisavacane puthuvacane ālapanaṁ bhavatīti
anya-e0803n5:16_0: Yamakamahātherena katāya pana cūḷaniruttiyaṁ ‘‘bho purisa’’iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṁ
anya-e0803n5:16_1: vatvā ‘‘bho purisā’’iti dīghavasena ālapanabahuvacanaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcāpi tādiso nayo
anya-e0803n5:16_2: niruttipiṭake natthi, tathāpi bahūnamālapanavisaye ‘‘bho yakkhā’’itiādīnaṁ ālapanabahuvacanānaṁ
anya-e0803n5:16_3: jātakaṭṭhakathādīsu dissanato pasatthatarova hoti viññūnaṁ pamāṇañca, tasmā iminā
anya-e0803n5:16_4: yamakamahātheramatenapi ‘‘puriso purisā purisa’’ntiādīni vatvā āmantane ‘‘bho purisa,
anya-e0803n5:16_5: bho purisā, bhavanto purisā’’ti nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n5:17_0: Tattha purisoti paṭhamāya ekavacanaṁ. Purisāti bahuvacanaṁ. Purisanti dutiyāya ekavacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:17_1: Puriseti bahuvacanaṁ. Purisenāti tatiyāya ekavacanaṁ. Purisehi, purisebhīti dve bahuvacanāni.
anya-e0803n5:17_2: Purisassāti catutthiyā ekavacanaṁ. Purisānanti bahuvacanaṁ. Purisā, purisasmā, purisamhāti
anya-e0803n5:17_3: tīṇi pañcamiyā ekavacanāni. Purisehi, purisebhīti dve bahuvacanāni. Purisassāti chaṭṭhiyā
anya-e0803n5:17_4: ekavacanaṁ. Purisānanti bahuvacanaṁ. Purise, purisasmiṁ, purisamhīti tīṇi sattamiyā
anya-e0803n5:17_5: ekavacanāni. Purisesūti bahuvacanaṁ. Bho purisāti aṭṭhamiyā ekavacanaṁ. Bho purisā,
anya-e0803n5:18_2: tathāpi atthavasena asaṅkarabhāvo veditabbo. Kathaṁ? ‘‘Puriso tiṭṭhati, purisā tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0803n5:19_0: Tattha ca bhoti āmantanatthe nipāto. So na kevalaṁ ekavacanaṁyeva hoti, atha kho
anya-e0803n5:19_2: pana bahuvacanameva hotīti ‘‘purisā’’ti puna vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Iti yamakamahātherena
anya-e0803n5:19_3: ‘‘bho purisa’’iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṁ vatvā ‘‘bho purisā’’iti dīghavasena
anya-e0803n5:19_4: ālapanabahuvacanaṁ vuttaṁ. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṁ aṭṭhakathāsu ca nipātabhūto bhosaddo
anya-e0803n5:19_5: ekavacanabahuvacanavasena dvidhā bhijjati. Atrimāni nidassanapadāni – ‘‘api nu kho
anya-e0803n5:19_6: sapariggahānaṁ tevijjānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ apariggahena brahmunā saddhiṁ saṁsandati sametīti,
anya-e0803n5:19_7: no hidaṁ bho gotama. Acchariyaṁ bho ānanda, abbhutaṁ bho ānanda, ehi bho samaṇa,
anya-e0803n5:19_8: bho pabbajita’’iccādipāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca bhosaddassa ekavacanappayoge pavattinidassanaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:19_9: ‘‘tena hi bho mamapi suṇātha. Yathā mayameva arahāma taṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya
anya-e0803n5:19_10: upasaṅkamituṁ, nāhaṁ bho samaṇassa gotamassa subhāsitaṁ subhāsitato nābbhanumodāmi,
anya-e0803n5:19_11: passatha bho imaṁ kulaputtaṁ. Bho yakkhā ahaṁ imaṁ tumhākaṁ bhājetvā dadeyyaṁ. Aparisuddho
anya-e0803n5:19_12: panamhi, bho dhuttā tumhākaṁ kriyā mayhaṁ na ruccati. So te purise āha bho tumhe
anya-e0803n5:19_13: maṁ mārentā rañño dassetvāva mārethā’’ti iccādi pana pāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca bhosaddassa
anya-e0803n5:19_14: bahuvacanappayoge pavattinidassanaṁ. Kaccāyanappakaraṇe pana ‘‘bho purisa, bho purisā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:19_15: padadvayaṁ ālapanekavacanavasena vuttaṁ. Taṁ yathā āgamehi na virujjhati, tathā gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:20_0: Keci pana adūraṭṭhassālapane ‘‘bho purisa’’iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṁ icchanti,
anya-e0803n5:20_1: dūraṭṭhassālapane pana ‘‘bho purisā’’iti dīghavasena ālapanekavacanaṁ icchanti. Adūraṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0803n5:20_2: dūraṭṭhānañca purisānaṁ itthīnañca ālapane na kiñci vadanti. Tathā adūraṭṭhāya dūraṭṭhāya
anya-e0803n5:20_3: ca itthiyā ālapane te pucchitabbā ‘‘adūraṭṭhānaṁ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapane kathaṁ
anya-e0803n5:20_4: vattabba’’nti. Addhā te evaṁ puṭṭhā uttari kiñci vattuṁ na sakkhissanti. Evampi te
anya-e0803n5:20_5: ce vadeyyuṁ ‘‘bhavanto purisāti imināva adūraṭṭhānaṁ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapanaṁ
anya-e0803n5:20_6: bhavatī’’ti. Tadā te vattabbā ‘‘yadi bhavanto purisā’’ti iminā advejjhena vacanena
anya-e0803n5:20_7: adūraṭṭhānaṁ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapanaṁ bhavati, evaṁ sante ‘‘bho purisa’’iti
anya-e0803n5:20_8: rassapadenapi dūraṭṭhassa ca purisassālapanaṁ vattabbaṁ, evaṁ avatvā kimatthaṁ adūraṭṭhassālapane
anya-e0803n5:20_9: ‘‘bho purisa’’iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṁ icchatha, kimatthañca dūraṭṭhassālapane
anya-e0803n5:21_0: Nanu ‘‘taggha bhagavā bojjhaṅgā, taggha sugata bojjhaṅgā’’tiādīsu ālapanapadabhūtaṁ
anya-e0803n5:21_1: ‘‘bhagavā’’iti dīghapadaṁ samīpe ṭhitakālepi dūre ṭhitakālepi buddhassālapanapadaṁ
anya-e0803n5:21_2: bhavitumarahateva, tathā ālapanapadabhūtaṁ ‘‘sugata’’iti rassapadampi. Yasmā panetesu
anya-e0803n5:21_3: ‘‘bhagavā’’ti ālapanapadassa na katthacipi rassattaṁ dissati, ‘‘sugatā’’ti ālapanapadassa
anya-e0803n5:21_4: ca na katthacipi dīghattaṁ dissati, tasmā dīgharassamattābhedaṁ acintetvā ‘‘purisa’’iti
anya-e0803n5:21_5: rassavasena vuttapadaṁ pakatissaravasena samīpe ṭhitassa purisassa āmantanakāle adūraṭṭhassālapanapadaṁ
anya-e0803n5:21_6: bhavati, āyatassaravasena dūre ṭhitapurisassa āmantanakāle dūraṭṭhassālapanapadaṁ
anya-e0803n5:21_7: bhavatīti gahetabbaṁ. Tathā ‘‘bhavanto purisā, bho yakkhā, bho dhuttā’’tiādīni dīghavasena
anya-e0803n5:21_8: vuttāni ālapanabahuvacanapadānipi pakatissaravasena samīpe ṭhitapurisānaṁ āmantanakāle
anya-e0803n5:21_9: adūraṭṭhānamālapanapadāni bhavanti, āyatassaravasena dūre ṭhitapurisādīnaṁ āmantanakāle
anya-e0803n5:21_10: dūraṭṭhānamālapanapadāni bhavantīti gahetabbāni. Tathā hi brāhmaṇā katthaci katthaci
anya-e0803n5:21_11: rassaṭṭhānepi dīghaṭṭhānepi āyatena sarena majjhimāyatena sarena accāyatena ca sarena
anya-e0803n5:21_12: vedaṁ paṭhanti likhitumasakkuṇeyyena gītassarena viya. Iti sabbakkharesupi āyatena
anya-e0803n5:21_14: purisa’’iti vacanena dūraṭṭhassa ca adūraṭṭhassa ca purisassālapanaṁ bhavati, ‘‘bho
anya-e0803n5:21_15: purisā, bhavanto purisā’’ti imehi vacanehipi dūraṭṭhānañca adūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapanaṁ
anya-e0803n5:21_16: bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Iti dūraṭṭhassa adūraṭṭhānañca āyatena sarena āmantanameva
anya-e0803n5:21_17: pamāṇaṁ, na dīgharassamattāviseso, tasmā ‘‘bho sattha, bho rāja, bho gaccha, bho
anya-e0803n5:21_18: muni, bho daṇḍi, bho bhikkhu, bho sayambhu, bhoti kaññe, bhoti patti, bhoti itthi,
anya-e0803n5:21_19: bhoti yāgu, bhoti vadhu, bho kula, bho aṭṭhi, bho cakkhu’’iccevamādīhi padehi adūraṭṭhassālapanañca
anya-e0803n5:21_20: dūraṭṭhassālapanañca bhavati. ‘‘Bhavanto satthā, satthāro, bhotiyo kaññā, kaññāyo’’ti
anya-e0803n5:23: Tassa taṁ vacanaṁ sutvā, rañño puttaṁ adassayuṁ;
anya-e0803n5:32: Na katthacipi dīghattaṁ, iti nīti mayā matā.
anya-e0803n5:33_0: Idampettha vattabbaṁ ‘‘kuto nu bho idamāyātaṁ ‘dūraṭṭhassālapanaṁ adūraṭṭhassālapanami’ti’’?
anya-e0803n5:33_1: Saddasatthato. Saddasatthaṁ nāma na sabbaso buddhavacanassopakārakaṁ, ekadesena pana hoti.
anya-e0803n5:34_1: atthato ekaṁ, byañjanameva nānaṁ, tasmā sabbattha ‘‘bahuvacana’’nti vā ‘‘puthuvacana’’nti
anya-e0803n5:34_2: vā ‘‘anekavacana’’nti vā vohāro kātabbo, puthuvacanaṁ anekavacananti ca idaṁ sāsane
anya-e0803n5:35_0: Kasmā pana imasmiṁ pakaraṇe dvivacanaṁ na vuttanti? Yasmā buddhavacane dvivacanaṁ
anya-e0803n5:35_1: nāma natthi, tasmā na vuttanti. Nanu buddhavacane vacanattayaṁ atthi, tathā hi ‘‘āyasmā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:35_2: idaṁ ekavacanaṁ, ‘‘āyasmantā’’ti idaṁ dvivacanaṁ, ‘‘āyasmanto’’ti idaṁ bahuvacananti?
anya-e0803n5:35_3: Tanna, yadi ‘‘āyasmantā’’ti idaṁ vacanaṁ dvivacanaṁ bhaveyya, ‘‘puriso purisā’’tiādīsu
anya-e0803n5:35_4: kataraṁ dvivacananti vadeyyātha, tasmā buddhavacane dvivacanaṁ nāma natthi. Teneva
anya-e0803n5:35_5: hi si yo aṁ yo nā hītiādinā ekavacanabahuvacanāneva dassitānīti.
anya-e0803n5:36_0: Nanu ca bho ‘‘suṇantu me āyasmantā, ajja uposatho pannaraso. Yadāyasmantānaṁ pattakallaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:36_1: mayaṁ aññamaññaṁ pārisuddhiuposathaṁ kareyyāmā’’ti pāḷiyaṁ dve sandhāya ‘‘āyasmantā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:36_2: vuttaṁ, ‘‘uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto cattāro pārājikā dhammā’’tiādīsu pana pāḷīsu bahavo
anya-e0803n5:36_3: sandhāya ‘‘āyasmanto’’ti vuttaṁ, na ca sakkā vattuṁ ‘‘yathā tathā vutta’’nti , parivāsādiārocanepi
anya-e0803n5:36_5: tiṇṇaṁ ārocentena ‘āyasmanto dhārentū’ti vattabba’’nti vuttattāti? Saccaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:36_6: taṁ pana vinayavohāravasena vuttanti. Nanu vinayo buddhavacanaṁ, kasmā ‘‘buddhavacane
anya-e0803n5:36_7: dvivacanaṁ nāma natthī’’ti vadathāti? Saccaṁ vinayo buddhavacanaṁ, tathāpi vinayakammavasena
anya-e0803n5:36_8: vuttattā upalakkhaṇamattaṁ, na sabbasādhāraṇabahuvacanapariyāpannaṁ. Yadi hi ‘‘āyasmantā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:36_9: idaṁ dvivacanaṁ siyā, tappayogānipi kriyāpadāni dvivacanāneva siyuṁ, tathārūpānipi
anya-e0803n5:36_10: kriyāpadāni na santi. Na hi akkharasamayakovido jhānalābhīpi dibbacakkhunā vassasatampi
anya-e0803n5:36_11: vassasahassampi samavekkhanto buddhavacane ekampi kriyāpadaṁ dvivacananti passeyya,
anya-e0803n5:36_12: evaṁ kriyāpadesu dvivacanassābhāvā nāmikapadesu dvivacanaṁ natthi. Nāmikapadesu tadabhāvāpi
anya-e0803n5:36_13: kriyāpadesu tadabhāvo veditabbo. Sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ dvīsupi dvivacanāni santi, māgadhabhāsāyaṁ pana natthi.
anya-e0803n5:37_1: dīpeti. Tañhi sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ vuttā dvivacanato bahuvacanato ca visuṁbhūtaṁ vacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:37_2: tattha vā vuttehi atthehi visuṁbhūtassa atthassa vacanaṁ ‘‘puthuvacana’’nti vuccati.
anya-e0803n5:37_3: Kathamidaṁ sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ vuttā dvivacanato bahuvacanato ca visuṁbhūtaṁ vacananti
anya-e0803n5:37_4: ce? Yasmā sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ ‘‘puthuvacana’’nti vohāro natthi, tasmā idaṁ tehi sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ
anya-e0803n5:37_5: vuttehi dvivacanabahuvacanehi visuṁbhūtaatthassa vacananti vuccati. Kathañca pana
anya-e0803n5:37_6: sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ vuttehi visuṁbhūtassa atthassa vacananti puthuvacananti ce? Yasmā
anya-e0803n5:37_7: sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ dve upādāya dvivacanaṁ vuttaṁ, na ticatupañcādike bahavo upādāya,
anya-e0803n5:37_8: bahavo pana upādāya bahuvacanaṁ vuttaṁ, na dve upādāya, ayaṁ sakkaṭabhāsāya viseso.
anya-e0803n5:37_9: Māgadhabhāsāyaṁ pana dviticatupañcādike bahavo upādāya puthuvacanaṁ vuttaṁ, tasmā
anya-e0803n5:37_10: sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ vuttehi atthehi visuṁbhūtassa atthassa vacananti puthuvacananti vuccati.
anya-e0803n5:37_11: Ayaṁ māgadhabhāsāya viseso. Tasmātra puthubhūtassa, puthuno vā atthassa vacanaṁ ‘‘puthuvacana’’nti
anya-e0803n5:38: Idāni ‘‘puriso, purisā, purisa’’nti niruttipiṭakato uddharitanayaṁ nissāya pakatirūpabhūtassa bhūtasaddassa nāmikapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n5:39_0: Bhūto, bhūtā. Bhūtaṁ, bhūte. Bhūtena, bhūtehi, bhūtebhi. Bhūtassa, bhūtānaṁ. Bhūtā,
anya-e0803n5:39_1: bhūtasmā, bhūtamhā, bhūtehi, bhūtebhi. Bhūtassa, bhūtānaṁ. Bhūte, bhūtasmiṁ, bhūtamhi,
anya-e0803n5:40_0: Atha vā ‘‘bho bhūtā’’iti bahuvacanaṁ viññeyyaṁ. Yathā panettha bhūtaiccetassa pakatirūpassa
anya-e0803n5:40_1: nāmikapadamālā purisanayena yojitā, evaṁ bhāvakādīnañca aññesañca taṁsadisānaṁ nāmikapadamālā
anya-e0803n5:40_2: purisanayena yojetabbā. Etthaññāni taṁsadisāni nāma ‘‘buddho’’tiādīnaṁ padānaṁ buddhaiccādīni pakatirūpāni.
anya-e0803n5:77_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṁ ‘‘nanu bho ‘orodhā ca kumārā cā’ti pāṭhassa dassanato orodhasaddo
anya-e0803n5:77_1: itthiliṅgo’’ti? Tanna, tattha hi ‘‘orodhā’’ti idaṁ okārantapulliṅgameva, nā’kārantitthiliṅgaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:77_2: tumhe pana ‘‘ākārantitthiliṅga’’nti maññamānā evaṁ vadatha, na panidaṁ ākārantitthiliṅgaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:77_3: atha kho ‘‘mātugāmā’’tipadaṁ viya bahuvacanavasena vuttamākārantapadanti. Nanu ca
anya-e0803n5:77_4: bho sammohavinodaniyādīsu orodhasaddassa itthiliṅgatā pākaṭā, kathanti ce? ‘‘Rukkhe
anya-e0803n5:77_5: adhivatthā devatā therassa kuddhā paṭhamameva manaṁ palobhetvā ‘ito te sattadivasamatthake
anya-e0803n5:77_6: upaṭṭhāko rājā marissatī’ti supine ārocesi. Thero taṁ kathaṁ sutvā rājorodhānaṁ ācikkhi.
anya-e0803n5:77_7: Tā ekappahāreneva mahāviravaṁ viraviṁsū’’ti. Ettha hi ‘‘rājorodhāna’’nti vatvā ‘‘tā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:77_8: vuttattāva orodhasaddassa itthiliṅgatā pākaṭāti? Tanna, atthassa duggahaṇato. Duggahito
anya-e0803n5:77_9: hi ettha tumhehi attho, ettha pana orodhasaddena itthipadatthassa kathanato itthipadatthaṁ
anya-e0803n5:77_10: sandhāya ‘‘tā’’ti vuttattā ‘‘tā itthiyo’’ti ayamevattho. Tumhe pana amātāpitarasaṁvaddhattā
anya-e0803n5:77_11: ācariyakule ca anivuṭṭhattā etaṁ sukhumatthamajānantā yaṁ vā taṁ vā mukhārūḷhaṁ vadatha.
anya-e0803n5:78: Bhuñjanatthaṁ kathanatthaṁ, mukhaṁ hotīti no vade;
anya-e0803n5:79: Yaṁ vā taṁ vā mukhārūḷhaṁ, vacanaṁ paṇḍito naroti.
anya-e0803n5:80_0: Na mayaṁbho yaṁ vā taṁ vā mukhārūḷhaṁ vadāma, aṭṭhakathācariyānaññeva vacanaṁ gahetvā
anya-e0803n5:80_1: vadāma, aṭṭhakathāyeva amhākaṁ paṭisaraṇaṁ , na mayaṁ tumhākaṁ saddahāmāti. Amhākaṁ
anya-e0803n5:80_2: saddahatha vā mā vā, mā tumhe ‘‘aṭṭhakathācariyānaññeva vacanaṁ gahetvā vadāmā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:80_3: aṭṭhakathācariye abbhācikkhatha. Na hi aṭṭhakathācariyehi ‘‘orodhasaddo itthiliṅgo’’ti
anya-e0803n5:80_4: vuttaṭṭhānamatthi, tasmāpi aṭṭhakathācariye abbhācikkhatha, na yuttaṁ buddhādīnaṁ
anya-e0803n5:80_5: garūnamabbhācikkhanaṁ mahato anatthassa lābhāya saṁvattanato. Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā
anya-e0803n5:80_6: ‘‘attanā duggahitena amhe ceva abbhācikkhati, bahuñca apuññaṁ pasavati, tato attānañca khaṇatī’’ti.
anya-e0803n5:81_0: Evaṁ abbhācikkhanassa ayuttataṁ sāvajjatañca dassetvā punapi te idaṁ vattabbā – jātakaṭṭhakathāyampi
anya-e0803n5:81_1: tumhehi āhaṭaudāharaṇasadisaṁ udāharaṇamatthi, taṁ suṇātha. Kosiyajātakaṭṭhakathāyañhi
anya-e0803n5:81_2: ‘‘satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṁ sāvatthiyaṁ mātugāmaṁ ārabbha kathesi. Sā kirekassa
anya-e0803n5:81_3: saddhassa pasannassa upāsakabrāhmaṇassa brāhmaṇī dussīlā pāpadhammā’’ti pāṭho dissati.
anya-e0803n5:81_4: Ettha hi ‘‘mātugāmaṁ ārabbha kathesī’’ti vatvā ‘‘sā’’ti vuttattā tumhākaṁ matena
anya-e0803n5:81_5: mātugāmasaddo itthiliṅgoyeva siyā, na pulliṅgo, kimidaṁ aṭṭhakathāvacanampi na passatha,
anya-e0803n5:81_6: tadeva pana aṭṭhakathāvacanaṁ passatha, kiṁ sā eva aṭṭhakathā tumhākaṁ paṭisaraṇaṁ, na tadaññāti.
anya-e0803n5:82_0: Yadi tāsaddaṁ apekkhitvā orodhasaddassa itthiliṅgattamicchatha, etthāpi sāsaddamapekkhitvā
anya-e0803n5:82_1: mātugāmasaddassa itthiliṅgattamicchathāti. Evaṁ vuttā te niruttarā appaṭibhānā maṅkubhūtā
anya-e0803n5:82_2: pattakkhandhā adhomukhā pajjhāyeyyuṁ. Etthāpi mātugāmasaddena itthipadatthassa kathanato
anya-e0803n5:82_3: itthipadatthaṁ sandhāya ‘‘sā’’ti vuttattā ‘‘sā itthī’’ti ayamevattho. Katthaci hi
anya-e0803n5:82_4: padhānavācakena pulliṅgena napuṁsakaliṅgena vā samānādhikaraṇassa guṇasaddassa abhidheyyaliṅgānuvattittāpulliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n5:82_5: vā napuṁsakaliṅgavasena vā niddisitabbattepi liṅgamanapekkhitvā itthipadatthamevāpekkhitvā
anya-e0803n5:82_6: itthiliṅganiddeso dissati. Taṁ yathā? ‘‘Idha visākhe mātugāmo susaṁvihitakammantā
anya-e0803n5:82_7: hoti saṅgahitaparijanā bhattumanāpaṁ carati, sambhataṁ anurakkhatī’’ti ca, ‘‘ko nu
anya-e0803n5:82_8: kho bhante hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacco mātugāmo dubbaṇṇā ca hoti durūpā supāpikā
anya-e0803n5:82_9: dassanāya, daliddā ca hoti appassakā appabhogā appesakkhā ca. Idha mallike ekacco
anya-e0803n5:82_10: mātugāmo kodhanā hoti upāyāsabahulā, appampi vuttā samānā abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati
anya-e0803n5:82_11: patitthiyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukarotī’’ti ca, ‘‘taṁ kho pana bhikkhave
anya-e0803n5:82_12: itthiratanaṁ rañño cakkavattissa pubbuṭṭhāyinī pacchānipātinī kiṁkārapaṭissāvinī’’ti ca ime payogā.
anya-e0803n5:83_0: Katthaci pana padhānavācakena napuṁsakaliṅgena samānādhikaraṇassa guṇasaddassa abhidheyyaliṅgānuvattittā
anya-e0803n5:83_2: pulliṅganiddeso dissati. Taṁ yathā? ‘‘Pañca paccekabuddhasatāni imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ
anya-e0803n5:83_3: pabbate ciranivāsino ahesuṁ. Taṁ kho pana rañño cakkavattissa pariṇāyakaratanaṁ ñātānaṁ
anya-e0803n5:83_4: pavesetā aññātānaṁ nivāretā’’ti. Katthaci padhānavācakena liṅgattayena samānādhikaraṇassa
anya-e0803n5:83_5: guṇasaddassa abhidheyyaliṅgānurūpaṁ niddeso dissati. Taṁ yathā? Sā itthī ‘‘sīlavatī
anya-e0803n5:83_6: kalyāṇadhammā. Aṭṭhahi kho nakulamāte dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā
anya-e0803n5:83_7: parammaraṇā manāpakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati. Saddho purisapuggalo,
anya-e0803n5:84: Seyyaiti saddo pana yebhuyyena okārantabhāve ṭhatvā liṅgattayānukūlo bhavati ekākāreneva tiṭṭhanato. Kathaṁ? Seyyo amitto matiyā upeto. Esāva pūjanā seyyo, ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ seyyo.
anya-e0803n5:89: Yaso ca appabuddhīnaṁ, viññūnaṁ ayaso ca yo;
anya-e0803n5:90: Ayasova seyyo viññūnaṁ, na yaso appabuddhinaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:91: Dummedhehi pasaṁsā ca, viññūhi garahā ca yā;
anya-e0803n5:94: Pavivekaṁ dukkhaṁ seyyo, yañce kāmamayaṁ sukhaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:96: Maraṇaṁ dhammikaṁ seyyo, yañce jīve adhammika’’nti.
anya-e0803n5:97_0: Evamayaṁ seyya iti saddo okārantabhāve ṭhatvā liṅgattayānukūlo bhavati. Katthaci
anya-e0803n5:97_1: pana ākārantabhāve ṭhatvā itthiliṅgānukūlo dissati ‘‘itthīpi hi ekacciyā, seyyā posa
anya-e0803n5:97_2: janādhipā’’ti. Niggahītanto pana hutvā napuṁsakaliṅgānukūlo apasiddho. Evaṁpakāre
anya-e0803n5:97_3: payoge kiṁ tumhe na passathāti. Evaṁ vuttā ca te niruttarāva bhavissanti.
anya-e0803n5:98_0: Sacepi te ettha evaṁ vadeyyuṁ ‘‘tattha tattha suttappadese aṭṭhakathādīsu ca ‘mātugāmo’ti
anya-e0803n5:98_1: vā ‘mātugāmenā’ti vā okārantapulliṅgabhāvena mātugāmasaddassa dassanato pulliṅgabhūtaṁ
anya-e0803n5:98_2: mātugāmasaddaṁ anapekkhitvā itthipadatthameva apekkhitvā ‘‘sā itthī’’ti itthīsaddena
anya-e0803n5:98_3: sāsaddassa sambandhaggahaṇaṁ mayaṁ sampaṭicchāma, ‘orodho’ti vā ‘orodhenā’ti vā okārantapulliṅgabhāvena
anya-e0803n5:98_4: ṭhitassa orodhasaddassa adassanato pana tumhehi vuttaṁ purimatthaṁ na sampaṭicchāmā’’ti.
anya-e0803n5:98_5: Tadā tesaṁ imāni vinayapāḷiyaṁ āgatapadāni dassetabbāni ‘‘tena kho pana samayena
anya-e0803n5:98_6: rājā udeno uyyāne paricāresi saddhiṁ orodhena, atha kho rañño udenassa orodho rājānaṁ
anya-e0803n5:98_7: udenaṁ etadavocā’’ti. Evaṁ imāni suttapadāni dassetvā suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘rāmo
anya-e0803n5:98_8: nāma rājā kuṭṭharogī orodhehi ca nāṭakehi ca jigucchamāno’’ti vacanañca dassetvā
anya-e0803n5:98_9: ‘‘gacchatha tumhe garukulamupagantvā bhagavato saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṁ sādhukaṁ
anya-e0803n5:99_0: Idāni mātugāmasaddādīsu kiñci vinicchayaṁ vadāma – mātugāmasaddo ca orodhasaddo ca
anya-e0803n5:99_1: dārasaddo cāti ime itthipadatthavācakāpi samānā ekantena pulliṅgā bhavanti. Tesu
anya-e0803n5:99_2: dārasaddassa ekasmiṁ atthe vattamānassāpi bahuvacanakattameva saddasatthavidū icchanti,
anya-e0803n5:99_3: na ekavacanakattaṁ. Mayaṁ pana dārasaddassa ekasmiṁ atthe ekavacanakattaṁ, yebhuyyena
anya-e0803n5:99_4: pana bahuvacanakattaṁ anujānāma, bavhatthe vattabbameva natthi. Pāḷiyañhi dārasaddo
anya-e0803n5:99_5: yebhuyyena bahuvacanako bhavati, ekavacanako appo. Tatrime payogā –
anya-e0803n5:101: Puttā ca dārā ca mayañca sabbe;
anya-e0803n5:103: Tasmā hi amhaṁ daharā na miyyare’’ti ca,
anya-e0803n5:105: Sahasā sampiyāyena, taṁ jaññāvasalo itī’’ti ca,
anya-e0803n5:107: Dissati paradāresu, taṁ parābhavato mukha’’nti ca,
anya-e0803n5:108: ‘‘Puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā’’ti ca byāse, samāse pana ‘‘puttadārā disā pacchā, puttadārehi mattano’’ti ca evamādayo bahuvacanappayogā bahavo bhavanti.
anya-e0803n5:109: Ekavacanappayogā pana appā. Seyyathidaṁ? ‘‘Garūnaṁ dāre, dhammaṁ care yopi samuñjakaṁ care, dārañca posaṁ dadamappakasmi’’nti ca,
anya-e0803n5:111: Dhammena dāraṁ posenti, te namassāmi mātalī’’ti ca,
anya-e0803n5:113: ‘‘Yo icche puriso hotuṁ, jātiṁ jātiṁ punappunaṁ;
anya-e0803n5:116_0: Samāhāralakkhaṇavasena panesa dārasaddo napuṁsakaliṅgekavacanopi katthaci bhavati.
anya-e0803n5:116_1: ‘‘Ādāya puttadāraṁ. Puttadārassa saṅgaho’’iti evaṁ idha vuttappakārena liṅgañca atthañca
anya-e0803n5:116_2: sallakkhetvā ‘‘puriso purisā’’ti pavattaṁ purisasaddanayaṁ nissāya sabbesaṁ ‘‘bhūto
anya-e0803n5:117_0: Kiṁ pana sabbāni okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbappakārena ekasadisāneva hutvā paviṭṭhānīti?
anya-e0803n5:117_1: Na paviṭṭhāni. Kānici hi okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhāni ca honti,
anya-e0803n5:117_2: ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca, kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca
anya-e0803n5:117_3: honti, ekadesena na paviṭṭhāni ca, kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhāneva.
anya-e0803n5:117_4: Tatra katamāni kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhāni ca honti, ekadesena
anya-e0803n5:117_5: paviṭṭhāni ca? ‘‘Saro vayo ceto’’tiādīni. Saroiti hi ayaṁsaddo ususaddasaravanaakārādisaravācako
anya-e0803n5:117_6: ce, purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭho. Rahadavācako ce, manogaṇapakkhikattā purisanaye
anya-e0803n5:117_7: ekadesena paviṭṭho. Vayoiti saddo parihānivācako ce, purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭho.
anya-e0803n5:117_8: Āyukoṭṭhāsavācako ce, manogaṇapakkhikattā purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭho. Ceto iti
anya-e0803n5:117_9: saddo yadi paṇṇattivācako, purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭho. Yadi pana cittavācako, manogaṇapakkhikattā
anya-e0803n5:117_10: purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭho. Manogaṇo ca nāma –
anya-e0803n5:123: Idāni yathāvuttassa pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṁ manasaddādīnaṁ nāmikapadamālaṁ kathayāma –
anya-e0803n5:124_0: Mano , manā. Manaṁ, mano, mane. Manasā, manena, manehi, manebhi. Manaso, manassa,
anya-e0803n5:124_1: manānaṁ. Manā, manasmā, manamhā, manehi, manebhi. Manaso, manassa, manānaṁ. Manasi,
anya-e0803n5:124_2: mane, manasmiṁ, manamhi, manesu. Bho mana, bhavanto manā.
anya-e0803n5:125_0: Atha vā ‘‘bho manā’’iti bahuvacanampi ñeyyaṁ. Evaṁ vaco, vacā. Vacaṁ, vaco, vace.
anya-e0803n5:125_1: Vacasātiādinā nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. Ahasaddassa pana bhummekavacanaṭṭhāne ahasi,
anya-e0803n5:125_2: ahe, ahasmiṁ, ahamhi, ahu, ahanīti yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n5:126: Idāni rūpantaravisesadassanatthaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgassa manasaddassapi nāmikapadamālaṁ vadāma, aṭṭhāne ayaṁ kathitāti na codetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:127_0: Manaṁ, manāni, manā. Manaṁ, manāni, mane. Manena, manehi, manebhi. Manassa, manaso,
anya-e0803n5:127_1: manānaṁ. Manā, manasmā, manamhā, manehi, manebhi. Manassa, manaso, manānaṁ. Mane,
anya-e0803n5:127_2: manasmiṁ, manamhi, manesu. Bho mana, bhavanto manā. Atha vā ‘‘bho manāni, bho manā’’evampi
anya-e0803n5:128_0: Ettha ca pulliṅgassa manasaddassa paccattakaraṇasampadānasāmibhummavacanāni mano
anya-e0803n5:128_1: manasā manaso manasīti rūpāni ṭhapetvā yāni sesāni, napuṁsakaliṅgassa ca manasaddassa
anya-e0803n5:128_2: paccattavacanāni ‘‘manaṁ manānī’’ti rūpāni ca, aṭṭhamyopayogavacanānaṁ ‘‘manaṁ manānī’’ti
anya-e0803n5:128_3: rūpadvayañca ṭhapetvā yāni sesāni, tāni sabbāni kamato samasamāni.
anya-e0803n5:129_0: Keci okāranto manoiti saddo napuṁsakaliṅgoti vadanti, te vattabbā – yadi so napuṁsakaliṅgo
anya-e0803n5:129_1: siyā, tassadisehi vaco vayotiādisaddehipi napuṁsakaliṅgeheva bhavitabbaṁ, na ‘‘te
anya-e0803n5:129_2: napuṁsakaliṅgā’’ti garū vadanti, ‘‘pulliṅgā’’icceva vadanti. Yasmā ca pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘kāyo
anya-e0803n5:129_3: anicco; mano anicco’’ti ca ‘‘kāyo dukkho, mano dukkho’’ti ca ‘‘nicco vā anicco vāti
anya-e0803n5:129_4: anicco bhante’’ti ca evamādayo pulliṅgappayogā bahavo diṭṭhā. Tena ñāyati manosaddo
anya-e0803n5:129_5: ekantena pulliṅgoti. Yadi pana napuṁsakaliṅgosiyā, ‘‘anicco dukkho’’ti evamādīni
anya-e0803n5:129_6: taṁsamānādhikaraṇāni anekapadasatānipi napuṁsakaliṅgāneva siyuṁ. Na hi tāni napuṁsakaliṅgāni,
anya-e0803n5:129_7: atha kho abhidheyyaliṅgānuvattakāni vāccaliṅgāni. Evaṁ manosaddassa pulliṅgatā paccetabbāti,
anya-e0803n5:129_8: sace manosaddo napuṁsakaliṅgo na hoti, kathaṁ ‘‘manānī’’ti napuṁsakarūpaṁ dissatīti?
anya-e0803n5:129_9: Saccaṁ ‘‘manānī’’ti napuṁsakaliṅgameva, tathāpi manogaṇe pamukhabhāvena gahitassokārantassa
anya-e0803n5:129_10: manasaddassa rūpaṁ na hoti. Atha kiñcarahīti ce? Cittasaddena samānaliṅgassa samānasutittepi
anya-e0803n5:129_11: manogaṇe apariyāpannassa niggahītantasseva manasaddassa rūpaṁ. Manasaddo hi punnapuṁsakavasena
anya-e0803n5:129_12: dvidhā bhijjati ‘‘mano manaṁ’’iti yathā ‘‘ajjavoajjava’’nti. ‘‘Mano ce nappadussati.
anya-e0803n5:129_13: Santaṁ tassa manaṁ hotī’’ti hi pāḷi. Yadi ca so manosaddo napuṁsakaliṅgo na hoti.
anya-e0803n5:134_0: Ettha manosaddena samānādhikaraṇo ‘‘patita’’nti saddo napuṁsakaliṅgabhāvena kasmā
anya-e0803n5:134_1: sannihito. Yasmā ca samānādhikaraṇapadaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgabhāvena sannihitaṁ, tasmā
anya-e0803n5:134_2: saddantarasannidhānavasena manosaddo napuṁsakaliṅgoti ñāyatīti? Tanna, samānādhikaraṇapadassa
anya-e0803n5:134_3: sabbattha liṅgavisesājotanato. Yadi hi samānādhikaraṇapadaṁ sabbattha liṅgavisesaṁ
anya-e0803n5:134_4: joteyya, ‘‘cattāro indriyānī’’ti etthāpi ‘‘cattāro’’ti padaṁ indriyasaddassa pulliṅgattaṁ
anya-e0803n5:134_5: kareyya, na ca kātuṁ sakkoti. Indriyasaddo hi ekantena napuṁsakaliṅgo. Yadi tumhe
anya-e0803n5:134_8: pulliṅgattaṁ icchathāti. Na mayaṁ bho indriyasaddassa pulliṅgattaṁ icchāma, atha
anya-e0803n5:134_9: kho napuṁsakaliṅgattaṁyeva icchāma, ‘‘cattāro’’ti padaṁ liṅgavipallāsavasena ṭhitattā
anya-e0803n5:134_10: ‘‘cattārī’’ti gaṇhāma, tasmā ‘‘cattāri indriyānī’’ti atthaṁ dhāremāti. Yadi evaṁ
anya-e0803n5:134_11: ‘‘patitaṁ asubhesu munissa mano’’ti etthāpi ‘‘patita’’nti padaṁ liṅgavipallāsavasena
anya-e0803n5:134_12: ṭhitanti mantvā ‘‘patito’’ti atthaṁ dhārethāti. Na dhārema ettha liṅgavipallāsassa
anya-e0803n5:134_13: anicchitabbato. Yadi hi manosaddo pulliṅgo siyā, taṁsamānādhikaraṇapadaṁ ‘‘patito’’ti
anya-e0803n5:134_14: vattabbaṁ siyā. Kimācariyo evaṁ vattuṁ na jāni, jānamāno eva so ‘‘patito’’ti nāvoca,
anya-e0803n5:134_15: ‘‘patita’’nti panāvoca, tena ñāyati ‘‘manosaddo napuṁsakaliṅgo’’ti. Mā tumhe evaṁ
anya-e0803n5:134_16: vadetha, samānādhikaraṇapadaṁ nāma katthaci padhānaliṅgamanuvattati, katthaci nānuvattati,
anya-e0803n5:134_17: tasmā na taṁ liṅgavisesajotane ekantato pamāṇaṁ. ‘‘Mātugāmo, orodho, āvuso visākha,
anya-e0803n5:134_18: ehi visākhe, cittāni aṭṭhīnī’’ti evamādirūpavisesoyeva pamāṇaṁ. Yadi samānādhikaraṇapadeyeva
anya-e0803n5:134_19: liṅgaviseso adhigantabbo siyā, ‘‘cattāro ca mahābhūtā’’tiādīsu liṅgavavatthānaṁ na
anya-e0803n5:134_20: siyā. Yasmā evamādīsupi ṭhānesu liṅgavavatthānaṁ hotiyeva. Kathaṁ? ‘‘Cattāro’’ti
anya-e0803n5:134_21: pulliṅgaṁ ‘‘mahābhūtā’’ti napuṁsakanti, tasmā ‘‘patitaṁ asubhesu munissa mano’’ti
anya-e0803n5:134_23: Idaṁ sutvā te tuṇhī bhavissanti. Tato tesaṁ tuṇhībhūtānaṁ idaṁ vattabbaṁ – yasmā
anya-e0803n5:134_24: manogaṇe pavattānaṁ padānaṁ samānādhikaraṇapadāni katthaci napuṁsakavasena yojetabbāni,
anya-e0803n5:134_25: tasmā manogaṇe pamukhassa manosaddassapi samānādhikaraṇapadāni katthaci napuṁsakavasena
anya-e0803n5:134_26: yojitāni. Tathā hi pubbācariyā ‘‘saddhammatejavihataṁ vilayaṁ khaṇena, veneyyasattahadayesu
anya-e0803n5:134_27: tamo’payāti. Dukkhaṁ vaco etasminti dubbaco. Avanataṁ siro yassa soyaṁ avaṁsiro,
anya-e0803n5:134_28: appakaṁ rāgādi rajo yesaṁ paññāmaye akkhimhi te apparajakkhā’’tiādinā saddaracanaṁ
anya-e0803n5:134_29: kubbiṁsu, na pana tehi vaco siro rajosaddādīnaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgattaṁ vibhāvetuṁ īdisī
anya-e0803n5:134_30: saddaracanā katā, atha kho siromanosaddānaṁ manogaṇe pavattānaṁ pulliṅgasaddānaṁ
anya-e0803n5:134_31: katthacipi īdisānipi liṅgavipallāsavasena ṭhitāni samānādhikaraṇapadāni hontīti paresaṁ
anya-e0803n5:134_32: jānāpanādhippāyavatiyā anukampāya viracitā. Etthāpi tumhākaṁ matena manosaddassa
anya-e0803n5:134_33: napuṁsakaliṅgatte sati vaco siro iccādayopi napuṁsakaliṅgattamāpajjanti napuṁsakaliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n5:134_34: samānādhikaraṇapadānaṁ niddiṭṭhattā. Kiṁ panetesampi napuṁsakaliṅgattaṁ icchathāti.
anya-e0803n5:134_35: Addhā te idampi sutvā nibbeṭhetumasakkontā tuṇhī bhavissanti. Kiñcāpi te aññaṁ gahetabbakāraṇaṁ
anya-e0803n5:134_36: apassantā evaṁ vadeyyuṁ ‘‘yadi bho mano saddo napuṁsakaliṅgona hoti, kasmā veyyākaraṇā
anya-e0803n5:134_37: ‘manosaddo napuṁsakaliṅgo’ti vadantī’’ti? Te vattabbā – yadi tumhe veyyākaraṇamataṁ
anya-e0803n5:134_38: gahetvā manosaddassa napuṁsakaliṅgattaṁ rocetha, nanu bhagavāyeva loke asadiso mahāveyyākaraṇo
anya-e0803n5:134_39: mahāpuriso visārado parappavādamaddano. Bhagavantañhi padakā veyyākaraṇā ambaṭṭhamāṇavapokkharasātisoṇadaṇḍādayo
anya-e0803n5:134_40: ca brāhmaṇā saccakanigaṇṭhādayo ca paribbājakā vādena na sampāpuṇiṁsu, aññadatthu
anya-e0803n5:134_41: bhagavāyeva mattavāraṇagaṇamajjhe kesarasīho viya asambhīto nesaṁ nesaṁ vādaṁ maddesi,
anya-e0803n5:134_42: mahante ca ne atthe patiṭṭhāpesi, evaṁvidhena bhagavatā vohārakusalena yasmā ‘‘kāyo
anya-e0803n5:134_43: anicco’’ti ca ‘‘kāyo dukkho, mano anicco, mano dukkho’’ti ca evamādinā vuttā manosaddassa
anya-e0803n5:134_44: pulliṅgabhāvasūcanikā bahū pāḷiyo dissanti, tasmā manosaddo pulliṅgoyevāti sārato
anya-e0803n5:134_45: paccetabboti. Evaṁ vuttā te niruttarā appaṭibhānā maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā adhomukhā pajjhāyissanti.
anya-e0803n5:136_0: Saro, sarā. Saraṁ, sare. Sarena, sarehi, sarebhi. Sarassa, sarānaṁ. Sarā, sarasmā,
anya-e0803n5:136_1: saramhā, sarehi, sarebhi. Sarassa, sarānaṁ. Sare, sarasmiṁ, saramhi, saresu. Bho
anya-e0803n5:137: Ayaṁ purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhassa ususaddasaravanaakārādisaravācakassa sarasaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n5:138: Ayaṁ pana purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhassa manogaṇapakkhikassa rahadavācakassa sarasaddassa nāmikapadamālā –
anya-e0803n5:139_0: Saro, sarā. Saraṁ, saro, sare. Sarasā, sarena, sarehi, sarebhi. Saraso, sarassa,
anya-e0803n5:139_1: sarānaṁ. Sarā, sarasmā, saramhā, sarehi, sarebhi. Saraso, sarassa, sarānaṁ. Sarasi,
anya-e0803n5:139_2: sare, sarasmiṁ, saramhi, saresu. Bho sara, bhavanto sarā, bho sarā iti vā.
anya-e0803n5:140: Vayo, vayā. Vayaṁ, vaye. Vayena, vayehi, vayebhīti purisanayena ñe yyo. Ayaṁ purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhassa parihānivācakassa vayasaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n5:141_0: Ayaṁ pana purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhassa manogaṇapakkhikassa āyukoṭṭhāsavācakassa
anya-e0803n5:141_1: vayasaddassa nāmikapadamālā – vayo, vayā. Vayaṁ, vayo, vaye. Vayasā, vayena, vayehi,
anya-e0803n5:141_2: vayebhīti mananayena ñeyyo. Tassa ceto paṭissosi, araññe luddagocaro. Cetā haniṁsu vedabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:142: Ceto, cetā. Cetaṁ, cete. Cetena, cetehi, cetebhīti purisanayena ñeyyo. Ayaṁ purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhassa paṇṇattivācakassa cetasaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n5:143_0: Ayaṁ pana purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhassa cittavācakassa cetasaddassa nāmikapadamālā
anya-e0803n5:143_1: – ceto, cetā. Cetaṁ, ceto, cete. Cetasā, cetena, cetehi, cetebhīti mananayena ñeyyo.
anya-e0803n5:143_2: Yaso kulaputto, yasaṁ kulaputtaṁ, yasena kulaputtenāti ekavacanavasena purisanayena
anya-e0803n5:143_3: yojetabbā, ekavacanaputhuvacanavasena vā. Evaṁ kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā
anya-e0803n5:143_4: paviṭṭhāni ca honti, ekadesena paviṭṭhāni cāti iminā nayena sabbapadāni paññācakkhunā
anya-e0803n5:143_5: upaparikkhitvā viseso veditabbo. Avisesaññuno hi evamādivibhāgaṁ ajānantā yaṁ vā
anya-e0803n5:143_6: taṁ vā byañjanaṁ ropentā yathādhippetaṁ atthaṁ virādhenti, tasmā yo ettha amhehi
anya-e0803n5:143_7: pakāsito vibhāgo, so saddhāsampannehi kulaputtehi sakkaccamuggahetabbo. Katamāni
anya-e0803n5:143_8: kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca ekadesena na paviṭṭhāni
anya-e0803n5:143_9: ca? Mano vaco tejosaddādayo ceva ayyasaddo ca, tatra manasaddādīnaṁ nāmikapadamālā heṭṭhā vibhāvitā.
anya-e0803n5:144_0: Ayyasaddassa pana nāmikapadamālāyaṁ ‘‘ayyo, ayyā. Ayyaṁ, ayye’’ti purisanayena vatvā
anya-e0803n5:144_1: ālapanaṭṭhāne ‘‘bho ayya, bho ayyo’’ti dve ekavacanāni, ‘‘bhavanto ayyā, bhavanto
anya-e0803n5:144_2: ayyo’’ti dve bahuvacanāni ca vattabbāni. Ettha ayyo iti saddo paccattavacanabhāve
anya-e0803n5:144_3: ekavacanaṁ, ālapanavacanabhāve ekavacanañceva bahuvacanañca. Tatrime payogā ‘‘ayyo
anya-e0803n5:144_4: kira sāgato ambatitthikena nāgena saṅgāmesi, pivatu bhante ayyo sāgato kāpotikaṁ
anya-e0803n5:144_5: pasanna’’nti evamādīni ayyosaddassa paccattekavacanappayogāni, ‘‘atha kho sā itthī
anya-e0803n5:144_6: taṁ purisaṁ etadavoca ‘nāyyo so bhikkhu maṁ nippāṭesi, apica ahameva tena bhikkhunā
anya-e0803n5:144_7: gacchāmi, akārako so bhikkhu, gaccha khamāpehī’ti’’ evamādīni ayyosaddassa ālapanekavacanappayogāni,
anya-e0803n5:144_8: ‘‘etha’yyo rājavasatiṁ, nisīditvā suṇātha me. Etha mayaṁ ayyo samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu
anya-e0803n5:144_9: pabbajissāmā’’ti evamādīni ayyosaddassa ālapanabahuvacanappayogāni. Bhavati catra –
anya-e0803n5:145: Ayyo iti ayaṁ saddo, paccattekavaco bhave;
anya-e0803n5:147: Evaṁ kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca honti ekadesena na paviṭṭhāni ca.
anya-e0803n5:148: Katamāni kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhāni? Gosaddoyeva. Gosaddassa hi ayaṁ nāmikapadamālā –
anya-e0803n5:149_0: Go, gāvo, gavo. Gāvuṁ, gāvaṁ, gavaṁ, gāvo, gavo. Gāvena, gavena, gohi, gobhi. Gāvassa,
anya-e0803n5:149_1: gavassa, gavaṁ, gunnaṁ, gonaṁ. Gāvā, gāvasmā, gāvamhā, gavā, gavasmā, gavamhā, gohi,
anya-e0803n5:149_2: gobhi. Gāvassa, gavassa, gavaṁ, gunnaṁ, gonaṁ. Gāve, gāvasmiṁ, gāvamhi, gave, gavasmiṁ
anya-e0803n5:149_3: , gavamhi, gāvesu, gavesu, gosu. Bho go, bhavanto gāvo, gavo. Ayaṁ purisanaye sabbathā
anya-e0803n5:150_0: Nanu ca bho gosaddo attanā sambhūtagoṇasaddamālāvasena purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭho
anya-e0803n5:150_1: ceva ekadesena na paviṭṭho cāti? Saccaṁ. Goṇasaddo gosaddavasena sambhūtopi ‘‘vatticchānupubbikā
anya-e0803n5:150_2: saddapaṭipattī’’ti vacanato gosaddato visuṁ amhehi gahetvā purisanaye pakkhitto.
anya-e0803n5:150_3: Tassa hi visuṁ gahaṇe yutti dissati syādīsu ekākāreneva tiṭṭhanato, tasmā gosaddato
anya-e0803n5:150_4: sambhūtampi goṇasaddaṁ anapekkhitvā suddhaṁ gosaddameva gahetvā purisanaye sabbathā
anya-e0803n5:151_0: Nanu ca bho paccattavacanabhūto goiti saddo purisoti saddena sadisattā purisanaye
anya-e0803n5:151_1: ekadesena paviṭṭhoti? Tanna, gosaddo hi niccamokāranto, na purisasaddādayo viya paṭhamaṁ
anya-e0803n5:151_2: akārantabhāve ṭhatvā pacchā paṭiladdhokārantaṭṭho. Teneva hi paccattavacanaṭṭhānepi
anya-e0803n5:151_3: ālapanavacanaṭṭhānepi goicceva tiṭṭhati. Yadi paccattavacanattaṁ paṭicca gosaddassa
anya-e0803n5:151_4: purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhatā icchitabbā, ‘‘kānici okārantapadānī’’ti evaṁ vuttā
anya-e0803n5:151_5: okārantakathā kamatthaṁ dīpeyya, nipphalāva sā kathā siyā, tasmā amhehi yathāvutto
anya-e0803n5:151_6: nayoyeva āyasmantehi manasi kātabbo. Evaṁ gosaddassa purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0803n5:152_0: Kecettha evaṁ puccheyyuṁ ‘‘gosaddassa tāva ‘go, gāvo, gavo. Gāvuṁ, gāvaṁ, gavaṁ’
anya-e0803n5:152_1: iccādinā nayena purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā amhehi ñātā, jaraggava puṅgavādisaddā
anya-e0803n5:152_2: pana kutra naye paviṭṭhā’’ti? Tesaṁ evaṁ byākātabbaṁ ‘‘jaraggava puṅgavādisaddā sabbathāpi
anya-e0803n5:152_3: purisanaye paviṭṭhā’’ti. Tathā hi tesaṁ gosaddato ayaṁ viseso, jaranto ca so go cāti
anya-e0803n5:152_4: jaraggavo. Ettha nakāralopo takārassa ca gakārattaṁ bhavati samāsapadattā, samāse
anya-e0803n5:152_5: ca simhi pare gosaddassokārassa avādeso labbhati, tasmā pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘visāṇena jaraggavo’’ti
anya-e0803n5:152_6: ekavacanarūpaṁ dissati. Tathā hi aññattha anupapadattā gavoiti bahuvacanapadaṁyeva
anya-e0803n5:152_7: dissati. Idha pana sopapadattā samāsapadabhāvamāgamma ‘‘jaraggavo’’ti ekavacanapadaṁyeva
anya-e0803n5:152_8: dissati. Tathā hi jaraggavoti ettha jarantā ca te gavo cāti evaṁ bahuvacanavasena
anya-e0803n5:152_9: nibbacanīyatā na labbhati lokasaṅketavasena ekasmiṁ atthe nirūḷhattāti. ‘‘Jaraggavo,
anya-e0803n5:152_10: jaraggavā. Jaraggavaṁ, jaraggave. Jaraggavenā’’ti purisanayena nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n5:153_0: Tatra puṅgavoti gunnaṁ yūthapati nisabhasaṅkhāto usabho. Yo pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘muhuttajātova
anya-e0803n5:153_1: yathā gavaṁpati, samehi pādehi phusī vasundhara’’nti ca ‘‘gavañce taramānānaṁ, ujuṁ
anya-e0803n5:153_2: gacchati puṅgavo’’ti ca āgato. Īdisesu pana ṭhānesu keci ‘‘pumā ca so go cāti puṅgavo’’ti
anya-e0803n5:153_3: vacanatthaṁ bhaṇanti. Mayaṁ pana padhāne nirūḷho ayaṁ saddoti vacanatthaṁ na bhaṇāma.
anya-e0803n5:153_4: Na hi puṅkokilotiādisaddānaṁ kokilādīnaṁ pumbhāvappakāsanamatte samatthatā viya imassa
anya-e0803n5:153_5: pumbhāvappakāsanamatte samatthatā sambhavati, atha kho padhānabhāvappakāsane ca samatthatā
anya-e0803n5:153_6: sambhavati. Tena ‘‘sakyapuṅgavo’’tiādīsu nisabhasaṅkhāto puṅgavo viyāti puṅgavo,
anya-e0803n5:153_7: sakyānaṁ, sakyesu vā puṅgavo sakyapuṅgavotiādinā samāsapadattho gahetabbo. Atha vā
anya-e0803n5:153_9: ‘‘sakyaseṭṭho’’tiādinā attho gahetabbo. Iti sabbathāpi purisanaye pavattanato jaraggava
anya-e0803n5:153_10: puṅgavādisaddānaṁ gosaddassa padamālato visadisapadamālatā vavatthapetabbā. Gosaddassa
anya-e0803n5:153_11: pana purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā ca vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0803n5:154_0: Āpasadde ācariyānaṁ liṅgavacanavasena matibhedo vijjati, tasmā taṁmatena tassa purisanaye
anya-e0803n5:154_2: pana nadiyā uttarena āpo’’ti vuttaṁ, ṭīkāyaṁ pana taṁ ulliṅgitvā ‘‘mahiyā nadiyā
anya-e0803n5:154_3: āpo tassa janapadassa uttarena honti, tāsaṁ avidūrattā so janapado uttarāpo’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:154_4: Evaṁ āpasaddassa ekantena itthiliṅgatā bahuvacanatā ca ācariyehi icchitā, tesaṁ mate
anya-e0803n5:154_5: āpoiti itthiliṅge paṭhamābahuvacanarūpe honte dutiyātatiyāpañcamīsattamīnaṁ bahuvacanarūpāni
anya-e0803n5:154_6: kīdisāni siyuṁ. Tathā hi ‘‘purise, purisehi purisebhi purisesū’’ti rūpavato pulliṅgassa
anya-e0803n5:154_7: viya okārantitthiliṅgassa ekāraehi kārādiyuttāni rūpāni katthacipi na dissanti. Ato
anya-e0803n5:157_0: Iccāpasaddassa itthiliṅgabahuvacanantatā veyyākaraṇānaṁ mataṁ nissāya anumatāti veditabbā.
anya-e0803n5:157_1: Aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ pana āpo iti saddassa napuṁsakaliṅgekavacanavasena vutto payogo diṭṭho
anya-e0803n5:157_2: ‘‘omattaṁ pana āpo adhimattapathavīgatikaṁ jāta’’nti. Jātakapāḷiyaṁ tu tassekavacanantatā
anya-e0803n5:157_3: diṭṭhā. Tathā hi ‘‘suciṁ sugandhaṁ salilaṁ, āpo tatthābhisandatī’’ti. Imasmiṁ padese
anya-e0803n5:157_4: āpo iti saddo ekavacanaṭṭhāne ṭhito diṭṭho. Kecettha vadeyyuṁ ‘‘āpoti saṅkhaṁ gataṁ
anya-e0803n5:157_5: salilaṁ suci sugandhaṁ hutvā tattha abhisandatīti salilaṁsaddavasena ekavacanappayogo
anya-e0803n5:157_6: kato, na nāmasaddavasena. Āpasaddo hi ekantenitthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacananto ca. Tathā
anya-e0803n5:157_7: hi ‘āpo tatthābhisandantī’ti bahuvacanavasena tappayogo vattabbopi chandānurakkhaṇatthaṁ
anya-e0803n5:157_8: vacanavipallāsavasena niddiṭṭho’’ti. Tanna, ‘‘āpo tatthābhisandare’’ti vattuṁ sakkuṇeyyattā
anya-e0803n5:157_9: ‘‘tāni ajja padissare’’ti bahuvacanappayogā viya. Yasmā evaṁ na vuttaṁ, yasmā ca
anya-e0803n5:157_10: pana pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘āpo labbhati, tejo labbhati, vāyo labbhatī’’ti ekavacanappayogo dissati,
anya-e0803n5:158_0: Athāpi ce vadeyyuṁ – nanu pāḷiyaṁyeva tassa bahuvacanantatā paccakkhato diṭṭhā ‘‘āpo
anya-e0803n5:158_1: ca devā pathavī ca, tejo vāyo tadāgamu’’nti? Tampi na. Ettha hi ‘‘devā’’ti saddaṁ
anya-e0803n5:158_2: apekkhitvā ‘‘āgamu’’nti bahuvacanappayogo kato, na ‘‘āpo’’ti saddaṁ. Yadi ‘‘āpo’’ti
anya-e0803n5:158_4: ca saddampi sandhāya bahuvacanappayogo kato siyā . Evaṁ sante pathavī tejo vāyosaddāpi
anya-e0803n5:158_5: bahuvacanakabhāvamāpajjeyyuṁ, na pana āpajjanti. Na hete bahuvacanakā, atha kho ekavacanakā
anya-e0803n5:158_6: eva. Rūḷhīvasena te pavattā pakatiāpādīsu atthesu appavattanato. Tathā hi āpokasiṇādīsu
anya-e0803n5:158_7: parikammaṁ katvā nibbattā devā ārammaṇavasena ‘‘āpo’’tiādināmaṁ labhantīti. Evaṁ
anya-e0803n5:158_8: vuttāpi te evaṁ vadeyyuṁ ‘‘nanu ca bho ‘aṅguttarāpesū’ti bahuvacanapāḷi dissatī’’ti?
anya-e0803n5:158_9: Te vattabbā – asampathamavatiṇṇā tumhe, na hi tumhe saddappavattiṁ jānātha, ‘‘aṅguttarāpesū’’ti
anya-e0803n5:158_10: bahuvacanaṁ pana ‘‘kurūsu aṅgesu aṅgānaṁ magadhāna’’ntiādīni bahuvacanāni viya rūḷhīvasena
anya-e0803n5:158_11: ekassāpi janapadassa vuttaṁ, na āpasaṅkhātaṁ atthaṁ sandhāya. ‘‘Aṅguttarāpesū’’ti
anya-e0803n5:158_12: ettha hi āpasaṅkhāto attho upasajjanībhūto, pulliṅgabahuvacanena pana vutto janapadasaṅkhāto
anya-e0803n5:158_13: atthoyeva padhāno ‘‘āgatasamaṇo saṅghārāmo’’ti ettha samaṇasaṅkhātaṁ atthaṁ upasajjanakaṁ
anya-e0803n5:158_14: katvā pavattassa āgatasamaṇasaddassa saṅghārāmasaṅkhāto attho viya, tasmā āpasaṅkhātaṁ
anya-e0803n5:158_15: atthaṁ gahetvā yo aṅguttarāpo nāma janapado, tasmiṁ aṅguttarāpesu janapadeti attho
anya-e0803n5:158_16: veditabbo. Tathā hi ‘‘aṅguttarāpesu viharati āpaṇaṁ nāma aṅgānaṁ nigamo’’ti pāḷi
anya-e0803n5:158_17: dissati. Tattha uttarena mahāmahiyā nadiyā āpo yesaṁ te uttarāpā, aṅgā ca te uttarāpā
anya-e0803n5:158_18: cāti aṅguttarāpā, tesu aṅguttarāpesu. Evaṁ ekasmiṁ janapadeyeva bahuvacanaṁ na āpasaṅkhāte
anya-e0803n5:158_19: atthe, tena aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘tasmiṁ aṅguttarāpesu janapade’’ti. Evaṁ vuttā
anya-e0803n5:159_0: Tathāpi ye evaṁ vadanti ‘‘āpasaddo itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanakocā’’ti. Te pucchitabbā
anya-e0803n5:159_1: ‘‘kiṁ paṭicca tumhe āyasmanto ‘āpasaddo itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā’ti vadathā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:159_2: ? Te evaṁ puṭṭhā evaṁ vadeyyuṁ – ‘‘aṅgāyeva so janapado, mahiyā pana nadiyā uttarena
anya-e0803n5:159_3: āpo, tāsaṁ avidūrattā uttarāpoti vuccatī’’ti ca ‘‘mahiyā pana nadiyā āpo tassa janapadassa
anya-e0803n5:159_4: uttarena honti, tāsaṁ avidūrattā so janapado uttarāpoti vuccatī’’ti ca evaṁ pubbācariyehi
anya-e0803n5:159_5: abhisaṅkhato saddaracanāviseso dissati, tasmā itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:159_6: vadāmāti. Saccaṁ dissati, so pana saddasatthe veyyākaraṇānaṁ mataṁ gahetvā abhisaṅkhato,
anya-e0803n5:159_7: saddasatthañca nāma na sabbathā buddhavacanassopakārakaṁ, ekadesena pana hoti, tasmā
anya-e0803n5:160_0: Yadi ca āpasaddo itthiliṅgabahuvacanako, kathaṁ āpoti padaṁ sijjhatīti? Āpasaddato
anya-e0803n5:160_1: paṭhamāyovacanaṁ katvā tassokārādesañca katvā āpoti padaṁ sijjhati ‘‘gāvo’’ti padamivāti.
anya-e0803n5:160_2: Visamamidaṁ nidassanaṁ, ‘‘gāvo’’ti padañhi niccokārantena gosaddena sambhūtaṁ. Tathā
anya-e0803n5:160_3: hi yomhi pare gosaddantassāvādesaṁ katvā tato yonamokārādesaṁ katvā ‘‘gāvo’’ti nipphajjati,
anya-e0803n5:160_4: āpasadde pana dve ādesā na santi. Buddhavacanañhi patvā āpasaddo akārantatāpakatiko
anya-e0803n5:161_0: Evaṁ vuttāpi te ‘‘idameva saccaṁ, nāñña’’nti cetasi sannidhāya ādhānaggāhiduppaṭinissaggibhāve,
anya-e0803n5:161_2: ca ṭhatvā evaṁ vadeyyuṁ ‘‘yatheva gāvosaddo, tatheva āposaddo kiṁ itthiliṅgo na bhavissati
anya-e0803n5:161_3: bahuvacanako cā’’ti? Tato tesaṁ imāni suttapadāni dassetabbāni. Seyyathidaṁ? ‘‘Āpaṁ
anya-e0803n5:161_4: āpato sañjānāti, āpaṁ āpato saññatvā āpaṁ maññati, āpasmiṁ maññati, āpaṁ meti maññati,
anya-e0803n5:161_5: āpaṁ abhinandatī’’ti evaṁ suttapadāni dassetvā ‘‘āpanti idaṁ kataravacana’’nti pucchitabbā.
anya-e0803n5:161_6: Addhā te āpasaddassa bahuvacanantabhāvameva icchamānā vakkhanti ‘‘dutiyābahuvacana’’nti.
anya-e0803n5:161_7: Te vattabbā ‘‘nanu yovacanaṁ na suyyatī’’ti? Te vadeyyuṁ ‘‘yovacanaṁ kataamādesattā
anya-e0803n5:161_8: na suyyatī’’ti. Yaṁ yaṁ bhonto icchanti, taṁ taṁ mukhārūḷhaṁ vadanti.
anya-e0803n5:162_0: ‘‘Āpato’’ti idaṁ pana kiṁ bhonto vadantīti? ‘‘Āpato’’ti idampi ‘‘bahuvacanakaṁ topaccayanta’’nti
anya-e0803n5:162_1: vadāma topaccayassa ekatthe ca bavhatthe ca pavattanato. Iti tumhe bahuvacanakattaṁyeva
anya-e0803n5:162_3: topaccayanta’’nti bhaṇatha, ‘‘āpasmiṁ maññatī’’ti ettha pana ‘‘āpasmi’’ntidaṁ kataravacanantaṁ
anya-e0803n5:162_4: katarādesena sambhūtanti? Addhā te evaṁ puṭṭhā niruttarā bhavissanti. Tathā yesaṁ
anya-e0803n5:162_5: evaṁ hoti ‘‘āpasaddo itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā’’ti, te pucchitabbā ‘‘yaṁ ācariyehi
anya-e0803n5:162_6: veyyākaraṇamataṁ gahetvā ‘yā āpo’ti ca ‘tāsa’nti ca vuttaṁ, tattha ‘kiṁ tāsa’nti
anya-e0803n5:162_7: vacane ‘āpāna’nti padaṁ ānetvā attho vattabbo, udāhu āpassā’’ti? ‘‘Āpāna’nti padamānetvā
anya-e0803n5:162_8: attho vattabbo’’ti ce, evañca sati ‘‘yā āpā’’ti vattabbaṁ ‘‘yā kaññā tiṭṭhantī’’ti
anya-e0803n5:162_9: padamiva. Atha ‘‘āpā’’ti padaṁ nāma natthi, ‘‘āpo’’ti padaṁyeva bahuvacanakanti ce,
anya-e0803n5:162_10: evaṁ sati ‘‘tāsa’’nti etthāpi ‘‘āpassā’’ti padaṁ ānetvā attho veditabbo. Kasmāti
anya-e0803n5:162_11: ce? Yasmā ‘‘āpo’’ti paccattekavacanassa tumhākaṁ matena bahuvacanatte sati ‘‘āpassā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:162_12: padampi bahuvacananti katvā tāsaṁsaddena yojetvā vattuṁ yuttitoti. Evaṁ sati ‘‘āpāna’’nti
anya-e0803n5:162_13: padassa abhāveneva bhavitabbaṁ. Yathā pana ‘‘puriso, purisā. Purisaṁ, purise’’ti
anya-e0803n5:162_14: ca, ‘‘go, gāvo, gavo. Gāvu’’nti ca ekavacanabahuvacanāni bhavanti, evaṁ ‘‘āpo, āpā.
anya-e0803n5:162_15: Āpaṁ, āpe’’ti ekavacanabahuvacanehi bhavitabbaṁ. Evañca sati ‘‘āpasaddo bahuvacanakoyeva
anya-e0803n5:163_0: Ye evaṁ vadanti, tesaṁ vacanaṁ sadosaṁ duppariharaṇīyaṁ mūlapariyāyasutte ‘‘āpaṁ
anya-e0803n5:163_1: maññati āpasmi’’nti ekavacanapāḷīnaṁ dassanato, visuddhimaggādīsu ca ‘‘vissandanabhāvena
anya-e0803n5:163_2: taṁ taṁ ṭhānaṁ āpoti appotīti āpo’’tiādikassa ekavacanavasena vuttanibbacanassa dassanato.
anya-e0803n5:163_3: Yathā pana pāḷiyaṁ itthiliṅgepi pariyāpanno gosaddo ‘‘tā gāvo tato tato daṇḍena ākoṭeyyā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:163_4: ca ‘‘annadā baladā cetā’’ti ca ādinā bavhatthadīpakehi itthiliṅgabhūtehi sabbanāmikapadehi
anya-e0803n5:163_5: ca asabbanāmikapadehi ca samānādhikaraṇabhāvena vutto dissati, na tathā pāḷiyaṁ bavhatthadīpakehi
anya-e0803n5:163_6: itthiliṅgabhūtehi sabbanāmikapadehi vā asabbanāmikapadehi vā samānādhikaraṇabhāvena
anya-e0803n5:163_7: vutto āpasaddo dissati. Yadi hi āpasaddo itthiliṅgo siyā, kaññasaddato āpaccayo viya
anya-e0803n5:163_8: āpasaddato āpaccayo vā siyā, nadasaddato viya ca īpaccayo vā siyā, ubhayampi natthi,
anya-e0803n5:163_9: ubhayābhāvato itthiliṅge vuttaṁ sabbampi vidhānaṁ tattha na labbhati, tena ñāyati
anya-e0803n5:163_10: ‘‘āpasaddo anitthiliṅgo’’ti. Nanu ca bho gosaddatopi āpaccayo natthi, tadabhāvato
anya-e0803n5:163_11: itthiliṅge vuttavidhānaṁ na labbhati, evaṁ sante kasmā soyeva itthiliṅgo hoti, na panāyaṁ āpasaddoti?
anya-e0803n5:164_0: Ettha vuccate – gosaddo na niyogā itthiliṅgo, atha kho pulliṅgova. Itthiliṅgabhāve
anya-e0803n5:164_1: pana tamhā āpaccaye ahontepi īpaccayo vikappena hoti, aññampi itthiliṅge vuttavidhānaṁ
anya-e0803n5:164_2: labbhati. So hi niccamokārantatāpakatiyaṁ ṭhatvā ‘‘go, gāvī’’tiādinā attano itthiliṅgarūpānaṁ
anya-e0803n5:164_3: nibbattikāraṇabhūto, tena so itthiliṅgo bhavati. Āpasadde pana īpaccayādi na labbhati.
anya-e0803n5:164_4: Tena so itthiliṅgoti na vattabbo. Yathā vā gosaddassa avisadākāravohārataṁ paṭicca
anya-e0803n5:164_5: itthiliṅgabhāvo upapajjati, na tathā āpasaddassa. Āpasaddassa hi anākularūpakkamattā
anya-e0803n5:164_6: avisadākāravohāratā na dissati, yāya eso itthiliṅgo siyā. Evaṁ vuttā te niruttarā bhavissanti.
anya-e0803n5:165_0: Tathā yesaṁ evaṁ hoti ‘‘āpasaddo sabbadā itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā’’ti, te
anya-e0803n5:165_1: vattabbā – yathā itthiliṅgabhūtassa kaññāsaddassa paṭhamaṁ kaññaiti rassavasena ṭhapitassa
anya-e0803n5:165_2: āpaccayato paraṁ smiṁvacanaṁ sarūpato na tiṭṭhati, yaṁbhāvena ca yābhāvena ca tiṭṭhati
anya-e0803n5:165_3: ‘‘kaññāyaṁ, kaññāyā’’ti, na tathā ‘‘itthiliṅga’’nti tumhehi gahitassa āposaddassa
anya-e0803n5:165_4: paṭhamaṁ āpaiti rassavasena ṭhapitassa paraṁ smiṁvacanaṁ yaṁbhāvena ca yābhāvena
anya-e0803n5:165_5: ca tiṭṭhati, atha kho sarūpatoyeva tiṭṭhati ‘‘āpasmiṁ maññatī’’ti. Yadi pana āpasaddo
anya-e0803n5:165_6: itthiliṅgo siyā, smiṁvacanaṁ sarūpato na tiṭṭheyya. Yasmā ca smiṁvacanaṁ sarūpato
anya-e0803n5:165_7: tiṭṭhati, tasmā āpasaddo na itthiliṅgo. Na hi caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassasaṅgahesu
anya-e0803n5:165_8: anekakoṭisatasahassesu pāḷippadesesu ekasmimpi pāḷippadese paṭhamaṁ akārantabhāvena
anya-e0803n5:165_9: ṭhapetabbānaṁ itthiliṅgasaddānaṁ parato ṭhitaṁ smiṁvacanaṁ sarūpato tiṭṭhatīti. Evaṁ
anya-e0803n5:166_0: Keci panettha evaṁ vadeyyuṁ ‘‘āpasaddo napuṁsakaliṅgo, tathā hi aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ ‘omattaṁ
anya-e0803n5:166_1: pana āpo adhimattapathavīgatikaṁ jāta’nti napuṁsakaliṅgabhāvena taṁsamānādhikaraṇapadāni
anya-e0803n5:166_2: niddiṭṭhānī’’ti? Tanna, manogaṇe pavattehi tama vaca sirasaddādīhi viya āpasaddenapi
anya-e0803n5:166_4: saddaracanāsu ‘‘saddhammatejavihataṁ vilayaṁ khaṇena, veneyyasattahadayesu tamo payātī’’ti
anya-e0803n5:166_6: ‘‘dukkhaṁ vaco etasmiṁ vipaccanīkasāte puggaleti dubbaco’’ti ettha ‘‘vaco’’ti padena
anya-e0803n5:166_7: samānādhikaraṇaṁ ‘‘dukkha’’nti napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ, ‘‘avanataṁ siro yassa so avanatasiro’’ti
anya-e0803n5:166_9: rāgādirajo yesaṁ paññāmaye akkhimhi te apparajakkhā’’ti ettha ‘‘rajo’’ti padena samānādhikaraṇaṁ
anya-e0803n5:166_10: ‘‘appa’’nti napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ dissati. Na te ācariyā tehi samānādhikaraṇapadehi tamavacasirasaddādīnaṁ
anya-e0803n5:166_11: napuṁsakaliṅgattaviññāpanatthaṁ tathāvidhaṁ saddaracanaṁ kubbiṁsu, atha kho ‘‘sobhanaṁ
anya-e0803n5:166_12: mano tassāti sumano’’ti ettha viya manogaṇe pavattapulliṅgānaṁ payoge napuṁsakaliṅgabhāvenapi
anya-e0803n5:166_13: samānādhikaraṇapadāni katthaci hontīti dassanatthaṁ kubbiṁsu. Yathā ca ‘‘vihata’’ntiādikā
anya-e0803n5:166_14: saddaracanā tamavacasirasaddādīnaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgattaviññāpanatthaṁ na katā, tathā
anya-e0803n5:166_16: napuṁsakaliṅgattaviññāpanatthaṁ na katā. Yasmā pana manogaṇe pavattehi manasaddādīhi
anya-e0803n5:166_17: ekadesena samānagatikattā āpasaddenapi napuṁsakaliṅgassa samānādhikaraṇatā yujjati,
anya-e0803n5:166_18: tasmā aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ ‘‘omattaṁ pana āpo adhimattapathavīgatikaṁ jāta’’nti napuṁsakaliṅgassa
anya-e0803n5:166_19: āpasaddena samānādhikaraṇatā katā. Tathāpi āpasaddo manasaddādīhi ekadesena samānagatiko
anya-e0803n5:166_22: liṅgavipariyayavasena pana katthaci evampi saddagati hotīti ñāpanatthaṁ vuttanti
anya-e0803n5:166_23: gahetabbaṁ. ‘‘Omatto’’ti ca ‘‘adhimattapathavīgatiko jāto’’ti ca liṅgaṁ parivattetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:166_24: Yadi hi āpasaddo napuṁsakaliṅgo siyā, sanikārāni’ssa paccattopayogarūpāni buddhavacanādīsu
anya-e0803n5:166_25: vijjeyyuṁ, na tādisāni santi. Kiñci bhiyyo – okārantaṁ nāma napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ katthacipi
anya-e0803n5:166_26: natthi, niggahītantaikāranta ukārantavasena hi tividhāniyeva napuṁsakaliṅgāni. Tena
anya-e0803n5:166_27: āpasaddassa napuṁsakaliṅgatā nupapajjatīti. Evaṁ vuttā te niruttarā bhavissanti.
anya-e0803n5:166_28: Iccokārantavasena gahitassa āpasaddassa itthiliṅgatā ca napuṁsakaliṅgatā ca ekantato
anya-e0803n5:166_29: natthi, niggahītantavasena pana gahitassa katthaci napuṁsakaliṅgatā siyā ‘‘bhante
anya-e0803n5:166_30: nāgasena samuddo samuddoti vuccati, kena kāraṇena āpaṁ udakaṁ samuddoti vuccatī’’ti
anya-e0803n5:166_31: payogadassanato. Ettha paneke vadeyyuṁ ‘‘yadi bho okārantavasena gahitassa āpasaddassa
anya-e0803n5:166_32: itthinapuṁsakaliṅgavasena dviliṅgatā natthi, okāranto āpasaddo kataraliṅgo’’ti? Pulliṅgoti mayaṁ vadāmāti.
anya-e0803n5:167_0: Yadi ca bho āpasaddo pulliṅgo. Yathā āpasaddassa pulliṅgatā paññāyeyya, nijjhānakkhamatā
anya-e0803n5:167_1: ca bhaveyya, tathā suttaṁ āharathāti. ‘‘Āharissāmisuttaṁ, na no suttāharaṇe bhāro
anya-e0803n5:167_2: atthī’’ti evañca pana vatvā tesaṁ imāni suttapadāni dassetabbāni. Seyyathidaṁ? ‘‘Āpo
anya-e0803n5:167_3: upalabbhatīti? Āmantā. Āpassa kattā kāretā upalabbhatīti? Na hevaṁ vattabbe. Atīto
anya-e0803n5:167_4: āpo atthīti? Āmantā. Tena āpena āpakaraṇīyaṁ karotīti? Na hevaṁ vattabbe. Āpaṁ maññati
anya-e0803n5:168_0: Ettha ca ‘‘upalabbhatī’’tiādinā āpasaddassa ekavacanatā siddhā, tāya siddhāya bahuvacanatāpi
anya-e0803n5:168_1: siddhāyeva. Ekavacanatāyeva hi saddasatthe paṭisiddhā, na bahuvacanatā, tena ‘‘āpenā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:168_2: iminā pana āpasaddassa itthiliṅgabhāvavigamo siddho itthiliṅge enādesābhāvato. ‘‘Āpassa,
anya-e0803n5:168_3: āpasmi’’nti imināpi itthiliṅgabhāvavigamoyeva itthiliṅge sarūpato nā smā smiṁ vacanānamabhāvā.
anya-e0803n5:169_0: Apica buddhavacanādīsu ‘‘cittāni, rūpānī’’tiādīni viya sanikārānaṁ rūpānaṁ adassanato
anya-e0803n5:169_1: okārantabhāvena gahitassa napuṁsakaliṅgabhāvavigamo atīva pākaṭo. Aparampettha vattabbaṁ
anya-e0803n5:169_2: – ‘‘atīto āpo atthīti? Āmantā’’ti ettha ‘‘atīto’’ti iminā āpasaddassa visadākāravohāratāsūcakena
anya-e0803n5:169_3: okārantapadena tassa avisadākāravohāratāya ca ubhayamuttākāravohāratāya ca abhāvo
anya-e0803n5:169_4: siddho. Tassa ca avisadākāravohāratāya abhāve siddhe itthiliṅgabhāvo dūrataro. Ubhayamuttākāravohāratāya
anya-e0803n5:169_5: ca abhāve siddhe napuṁsakaliṅgabhāvopi dūrataroyeva. Iti na katthacipi okārantabhāvena
anya-e0803n5:169_6: gahito āpasaddo itthiliṅgo vā napuṁsakaliṅgo vā bhavati. Milindapañhe pana niggahītantavasena
anya-e0803n5:169_7: āgato napuṁsakaliṅgoti veditabbo, na cettha vattabbaṁ ‘‘atīto’’ti ‘‘tenā’’ti ca imāni
anya-e0803n5:169_10: Apica vohārakusalā tathāgatā tathāgatasāvakā ca, tehiyeva uttamapurisehi vohārakusalehi
anya-e0803n5:169_12: vuttānīti na cintetabbāni, tasmā taṁsamānādhikaraṇo okārantabhāvena gahito āpasaddo
anya-e0803n5:169_13: ekavacananto pulliṅgo ceva yathāpayogaṁ ekavacanabahuvacanako cāti veditabbo ‘‘āpo,
anya-e0803n5:169_14: āpā. Āpaṁ, āpe’’tiādinā yojetabbattā. Evaṁ vuttāni suttapadāni savinicchayāni sutvā
anya-e0803n5:169_15: addhā te āpasaddassa itthiliṅgabahuvacanatāvādino niruttarā bhavissanti.
anya-e0803n5:170_0: Ettha koci vadeyya – pāḷiyaṁ pulliṅganayo ekavacananayo ca kiṁ aṭṭhakathāṭīkācariyehi
anya-e0803n5:170_1: na diṭṭho, ye āpasaddassa itthiliṅgabahuvacanattaṁ vaṇṇesunti? No na diṭṭho, diṭṭhoyeva
anya-e0803n5:170_2: so nayo tehi. Yasmā pana te na kevalaṁ sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacaneyeva visāradā,
anya-e0803n5:170_3: atha kho sakalepi saddasatthe visāradā, tasmā saddasatthe attano paṇḍiccaṁ pakāsetuṁ,
anya-e0803n5:170_4: ‘‘saddasatthe ca īdiso nayo vutto’’ti viññāpetuñca saddasatthanayaṁ gahetvā āpasaddassa
anya-e0803n5:170_5: itthiliṅgabahuvacanakattaṁ vaṇṇesunti natthi tesaṁ doso. Tathā hi mūlapariyāyasuttantaṭṭhakathāyaṁ
anya-e0803n5:170_7: catubbidho āpo, tesū’’tiādi, tasmā natthi tesaṁ doso. Pūjārahā hi te āyasmanto, namoyeva
anya-e0803n5:170_8: tesaṁ karoma, na tesaṁ vacanaṁ codanābhājanaṁ. Ye pana ujuvipaccanīkavādā daḷhameva
anya-e0803n5:170_9: āpasaddassa itthiliṅgabahuvacanattaṁ mamāyanti, tesaṁyeva vacanaṁ codanābhājanaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:170_10: Yasmā pana mayaṁ pāḷinayānusārena antadvayavato āpasaddassa pulliṅgattaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgattañca
anya-e0803n5:170_11: vidadhāma, tasmā yo koci idaṁ vādaṁ madditvā aññaṁ vādaṁ patiṭṭhāpetuṁ sakkhissatīti
anya-e0803n5:170_12: netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati, idañca pana ṭhānaṁ mahāgahanaṁ duppaṭivijjhanaṭṭhena, paramasukhumañca
anya-e0803n5:170_13: katañāṇasambhārehi paramasukhumañāṇehi paṇḍitehi vedanīyattā. Sabbamidañhi vacanaṁ
anya-e0803n5:170_14: tesu tesu ṭhānesu atthabyañjanapariggahaṇe sotūnaṁ paramakosallajananatthañceva sāsane
anya-e0803n5:170_15: ādaraṁ akatvā saddasatthamatena kālaṁ vītināmentānaṁ sāthalikānaṁ pamādavihāranisedhanatthañca
anya-e0803n5:170_17: nītiyaṁ saddhāsampannehi kulaputtehi yogo karaṇīyo bhagavato sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:171_0: Yasmā pana pāḷito aṭṭhakathā balavatī nāma natthi, tasmā pāḷinayānurūpeneva āpasaddassa
anya-e0803n5:171_1: nāmikapadamālaṁ yojessāma sotūnamasammohatthaṁ, kimettha saddasatthanayo karissati.
anya-e0803n5:171_2: Atrāyaṁ udānapāḷi ‘‘kiṁ kayirā udapānena, āpā ce sabbadā siyu’’nti.
anya-e0803n5:172: Āpo, āpā. Āpaṁ, āpe. Āpena, āpehi, āpebhi. Āpassa, āpānaṁ. Āpā, āpasmā, āpamhā, āpehi, āpebhi. Āpassa, āpānaṁ. Āpe, āpasmiṁ, āpamhi, āpesu. Bho āpa, bhavanto āpā.
anya-e0803n5:173: Sabbanāmādīhipi yojessāma – yo āpo, ye āpā. Yaṁ āpaṁ, ye āpe. Yena āpena, sesaṁ neyyaṁ , so āpo, te āpā. Atīto āpo, atītā āpā. Sesaṁ neyyaṁ. Iccevaṁ –
anya-e0803n5:175: Na sabbathāva gosaddo, purisena samo mato.
anya-e0803n5:177: Sarādī ekadesena, sabbathā vā samā matā.
anya-e0803n5:178: Ye panettha saddā ‘‘manogaṇo’’ti vuttā, kathaṁ tesaṁ manogaṇabhāvo sallakkhetabboti? Vuccate tesaṁ manogaṇabhāvasallakkhaṇakāraṇaṁ –
anya-e0803n5:189_0: Atra tassatthassa sādhakāni payogāni sāsanato ca lokato ca yathārahamāharitvā dassessāma
anya-e0803n5:189_1: – manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā. Na mayhaṁ manaso piyo. Sādhukaṁ manasi
anya-e0803n5:189_2: karotha. Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā. Manoramaṁ, manodhātu, manomayena kāyena, iddhiyā
anya-e0803n5:189_3: upasaṅkami. Yo ve ‘‘dassa’’nti vatvāna, adāne kurute mano. Vacasā paricitā. Vacaso vacasi.
anya-e0803n5:193: Esa bhiyyo pasīdāmi, sutvāna munino vaco.
anya-e0803n5:194_0: Sakhā ca mitto ca mamāsi sīvika, susikkhito sādhu karohi me vaco. Ekūnatiṁso vayasā
anya-e0803n5:194_1: subhadda. Vayaso, vayasi, vayovuddho, vayoguṇā anupubbaṁ jahanti. Jalantamiva tejasā.
anya-e0803n5:194_2: Tejaso, tejasi, tejodhātukusalo. Tejokasiṇaṁ. Tapasā uttamo, tapaso, tapasi, tapodhano,
anya-e0803n5:194_3: tapojigucchā. Kasmā bhavaṁ vijanamaraññanissito, tapo idha krubbasi brahmapattiyā.
anya-e0803n5:194_4: Cetasā aññāsi, evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi, etamatthaṁ cetasi sannidhāya, cetoparivitakkamaññāya.
anya-e0803n5:194_5: Cetopariyañāṇaṁ, ceto paricchindati, so parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cetasā ceto paricca
anya-e0803n5:194_6: jānāti. Tamasā, tamaso, tamasi, tamonudo, tamoharo. Navāhametaṁ yasasā dadāmi. Yasaso,
anya-e0803n5:194_7: yasasi, yaso bhogasamappito. Yasoladdhākho panasmākaṁ bhogā. Yasodharā devī, yaso
anya-e0803n5:194_8: laddhā na majjeyya. Ayasāva malaṁ samuṭṭhitaṁ. Ayaso, ayasi, ayopākārapariyantaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:194_9: ayasā paṭikujjitaṁ. Seyyo ayoguḷo bhutto, ayopatto , ayomayaṁ, ayo kantatīti ayokanto.
anya-e0803n5:194_10: Ghatena vā bhuñjassu payasā vā, sādhu khalu payaso pānaṁ yaññadattena, payasi ojā,
anya-e0803n5:194_11: payodharā, payonidhi. Sahassanetto sirasā paṭiggahi. Siraso, sirasi añjaliṁ katvā,
anya-e0803n5:194_12: vanditabbaṁ isiddhajaṁ. Siroruhā, siro chindati. Yo kāme parivajjeti, sappasseva
anya-e0803n5:194_13: padāsiro. Siro te vajjhayitvāna. Sarasā, saraso, tīṇi uppalajātāni, tasmiṁ sarasi
anya-e0803n5:194_14: brāhmaṇa. Saroruhaṁ. Yaṁ etā upasevanti, chandasāvā dhanenavā. Sāvittī chandaso mukhaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:194_15: Chandasi, chandoviciti, chandobhaṅgo, urasā panudahissāmi, uraso, urasi jāyati, urasilomo,
anya-e0803n5:194_16: uromajjhe vijjhi. Rahasā, rahaso, rahasi, rahogato nisīditvā, evaṁ cintesahaṁ tadā.
anya-e0803n5:194_17: Ahasā, ahasi. Jāyanti tattha pārohā, ahorattānamaccayeti imāni payogāni. Ettha ca
anya-e0803n5:194_18: ‘‘manena, manassa, mane, manasmiṁ, manamhī’’tiādīni ca ‘‘manaāyatanaṁ tamaparāyano
anya-e0803n5:194_19: ayapatto chandahānī’’tiādīni ca ‘‘na manaṁ aññāsi. Yasaṁ laddhāna dummedho. ‘‘Siraṁ
anya-e0803n5:194_20: chindatī’’tiādīni ca rūpāni manogaṇabhāvappakāsakāni na hontīti na dassitāni, na
anya-e0803n5:194_21: alabbhamānavasena, tasmātra imā ādito paṭṭhāya manogaṇabhāvavibhāvinī gāthāyo bhavanti –
anya-e0803n5:207: ‘‘Vaco sutvā, siro chindi, ayo kantati’’ iccapi;
anya-e0803n5:212: Sā so syantāni rūpāni, sandissanti manogaṇe;
anya-e0803n5:214: Idaṁ manogaṇalakkhaṇaṁ. Evaṁ manogaṇalakkhaṇaṁ anākulaṁ niggumbaṁ nijjaṭaṁ samuddiṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:224_0: Seyyathidaṁ? ‘‘Bilaṁ padaṁ mukha’’miccādayo. Tesaṁ rūpāni bhavanti – bilasā, bilaso,
anya-e0803n5:224_1: bilasi, bilagato, bilaṁ pāvisi. Padasāva agamāsi, tīṇi padavārāni, mākāsi mukhasā
anya-e0803n5:224_2: pāpaṁ, mukhagataṁ bhojanaṁ chaḍḍāpeti. Saccena danto damasā upeto. Rasavaraṁ rasamayaṁ
anya-e0803n5:227: Nā sa smiṁvisaye sāso-syantā pana na hontihi.
anya-e0803n5:232_0: Seyyathidaṁ? ‘‘Āpo vāyo sarado’’iccevamādayo. Tesaṁ rūpāni bhavanti – āpodhātu, vāyodhātu,
anya-e0803n5:232_1: āpokasiṇaṁ, vāyokasiṇaṁ, āpomayaṁ, vāyomayaṁ, jīva tvaṁ saradosataṁ, saradakālo.
anya-e0803n5:232_2: Āpena, āpassa, āpe, āpasmiṁ, āpamhi. Vāyena, vāyassa, vāye, vāyasmiṁ, vāyamhi. Saradena,
anya-e0803n5:232_3: saradassa, sarade, saradasmiṁ, saradamhi. Āpaṁ āpato sañjānāti. Vāyaṁ vāyato sañjānāti.
anya-e0803n5:233: Keci panettha vadeyyuṁ ‘‘nanu sāsane vāyasaddo viya vāyusaddopi manogaṇādīsu icchitabbo’’ti? Ettha vuccate –
anya-e0803n5:240: Yathā hi āyusaddassa, rūpaṁ dissati sāgamaṁ;
anya-e0803n5:242: Na tathā vāyusaddassa, rūpaṁ dissati sāgamaṁ;
anya-e0803n5:244: Tathā hi ‘‘vāyati iti, vāyo’’ iti garū vaduṁ;
anya-e0803n5:246: Yattha pathavī ca āpo ca, tejo vāyo na gādhati;
anya-e0803n5:248: Idampi manogaṇādikalakkhaṇaṁ. Ettha manogaṇādikā dvidhā bhijjanti bila padādito āpādito ca. Evaṁ manogaṇādikalakkhaṇaṁ anākulaṁ niggumbaṁ nijjaṭaṁ samuddiṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:250: Ye ca nāvisaye sontā, ye ca smāvisaye siyuṁ;
anya-e0803n5:252_0: Ke te? Atthabyañjanakkharasaddādayo ceva dīghorasaddā ca. Etesu hi atthasaddādīnaṁ
anya-e0803n5:252_1: nāvacanaṭṭhāne ‘‘atthaso byañjanaso akkharaso suttaso upāyaso sabbaso ṭhānaso’’tiādīni
anya-e0803n5:252_2: sontāni rūpāni bhavanti. Dīghorasaddānaṁ pana smāvacanaṭṭhāne ‘‘dīghaso oraso’’ti
anya-e0803n5:254: Sabbathā vinimuttā ye, sā so syantādibhāvato;
anya-e0803n5:256: Ke te? ‘‘Puriso kaññā citta’’miccādayo. Idampi amanogaṇalakkhaṇaṁ. Evaṁ amanogaṇalakkhaṇaṁ anākulaṁ niggumbaṁ nijjaṭaṁ samuddiṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:257_0: Evaṁ dassitesu manogaṇalakkhaṇādīsu koci vadeyya ‘‘yadidaṁ tumhehi vuttaṁ ‘ye samāsādibhāvamhi,
anya-e0803n5:257_1: majjhokārāva honti tū’tiādinā manogaṇādikalakkhaṇaṁ, tena ‘‘parosataṁ gomayaṁ godhano’’iccādīsu
anya-e0803n5:257_2: goparasaddādayopi manogaṇādikabhāvaṁ āpajjantīti? Nāpajjanti. Kasmāti ce? Yasmā –
anya-e0803n5:262: Tasmā nāpajjanti. Iti sabbathāpi amanogaṇalakkhaṇaṁ nissesato dassitaṁ. Iccevaṁ manogaṇavibhāvanāyaṁ manogaṇo manogaṇādiko amanogaṇo cāti tidhā bhedo veditabbo.
anya-e0803n5:263_0: Tattha manogaṇe pariyāpannasaddānaṁ samāsaṁ patvā ‘‘abyaggamanaso naro, thiracetasaṁ
anya-e0803n5:263_1: kulaṁ, saddheyyavacasā upāsikātiādinā liṅgattayavasena aññathāpi rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n5:263_2: Ettha pana keci evaṁ vadanti ‘‘yadā manasaddo sakatthe avattitvā ‘abyaggo mano yassa
anya-e0803n5:263_3: soyaṁ abyaggamanaso, alīno mano yassa soyaṁ alīnamanaso’ti evaṁ aññatthe vattati,
anya-e0803n5:263_4: tadā purisanayeneva nāmikapadamālā labbhati, na manogaṇanayenā’’ti. Taṁ na gahetabbaṁ
anya-e0803n5:263_5: ubhinnampi yathārahaṁ labbhanato. Tathā hi visuddhimagge puggalāpekkhanavasena ‘‘khantisoraccamettādi-guṇabhūsitacetaso.
anya-e0803n5:263_6: Ajjhesanaṁ gahetvānā’’ti ettha manogaṇanayo dissati. Taṭṭīkāyampi ‘‘ajjhesito dāṭhānāga-ttherena
anya-e0803n5:263_7: thiracetasā’’ti manogaṇanayo dissati, tasmā tesaṁ vacanaṁ na gahetabbaṁ. Evaṁ vadantā
anya-e0803n5:263_8: ca te abyaggamanasaddādīnaṁ abyaggamanasaiccādinā sakārantapakatibhāvena ṭhapetabbabhāvaṁ
anya-e0803n5:263_9: vibbhantamativasena cintetvā sabbāsu vibhattīsu, dvīsu ca vacanesu purisanayena yojetabbataṁ
anya-e0803n5:263_11: nasiyuṁ, aññāniyeva anabhimatāni rūpāni siyuṁ. Yasmā siyuṁ, tasmā evaṁ aggahetvā
anya-e0803n5:264_0: Yattha hi samāsavasena manasaddo cetasaddādayo ca sakatthe avattitvā aññatthe vattanti,
anya-e0803n5:264_1: tattha sakārāgamānaṁ padānaṁ nāmikapadamālā purisanayena ca manogaṇe mananayena ca
anya-e0803n5:264_2: yathārahaṁ labbhati. Nissakārāgamānaṁ pana purisanayeneva labbhati. Yattha pana samāsavisayeyeva
anya-e0803n5:264_3: manādisaddā sakatthe vattanti, tattha nissakārāgamānaṁ nāmikapadamālā purisanayena
anya-e0803n5:265_0: Idāni imassatthassa āvibhāvatthaṁ, saddagatīsu ca viññūnaṁ kosalluppādanatthaṁ yathāvuttānaṁ
anya-e0803n5:265_1: padānaṁ padamālā tidhā katvā dassayissāma – ‘‘byāsatto mano yassa soyaṁ byāsattamanaso
anya-e0803n5:266_0: Byāsattamanaso naro, byāsattamanasā narā. Byāsattamanasaṁ naraṁ, byāsattamanase nare.
anya-e0803n5:266_1: Byāsattamanasā, byāsattamanena narena, byāsattamanehi, byāsattamanebhi narehi. Byāsattamanaso,
anya-e0803n5:266_2: byāsattamanassa narassa, byāsattamanānaṁ narānaṁ. Byāsattamanā, byāsattamanasmā,
anya-e0803n5:266_3: byāsattamanamhā narā, byāsattamanehi, byāsattamanebhi narehi. Byāsattamanaso, byāsattamanassa
anya-e0803n5:266_4: narassa, byāsattamanānaṁ narānaṁ. Byāsattamanasi, byāsattamane, byāsattamanasmiṁ,
anya-e0803n5:266_5: byāsattamanamhi nare, byāsattamanesu naresu. Bho byāsattamanasa nara, bhavanto byāsattamanasā
anya-e0803n5:267_0: Evaṁ sakārāgamassa labbhamānālabbhamānatā vavatthapetabbā. Ettha hi paṭhamādutiyāvibhattīnaṁ
anya-e0803n5:267_1: ekavacanabahuvacanaṭṭhāne ca tatiyācatutthīchaṭṭhīsattamīnaṁ ekavacanaṭṭhāne ca yathārahaṁ
anya-e0803n5:267_2: sāgamo bhavati ādesasaravibhattisaraparattā. Ayañca nayo sukhumo sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbo.
anya-e0803n5:268_0: Aparo nayo – ‘‘byāsatto mano yassa soyaṁ byāsattamano’’ti evampi puggalāpekkhakassa
anya-e0803n5:268_1: imassa padassa ‘‘byāsattamano naro, byāsattamanā narā. Byāsattamanaṁ nara’’ntiādinā
anya-e0803n5:268_2: purisanayeneva nāmikapadamālā bhavati. Ettha pana sabbathāpi sāgamo natthi. Aparopi
anya-e0803n5:268_3: nayo – ‘‘byāsatto ca so mano cāti byāsattamano’’ti evaṁ cittāpekkhakassapi imassa
anya-e0803n5:268_5: byāsattamanenā’’tiādinā manogaṇe mananayena nāmikapadamālā bhavati, ettha pana tatiyācatutthīchaṭṭhīsattamīnaṁ
anya-e0803n5:268_6: ekavacanaṭṭhāneyeva sāgamo bhavati ādesasaraparattā. Yathā ca ettha, evaṁ ‘‘alīnamanaso
anya-e0803n5:269_0: Napuṁsakaliṅge pana vattabbe ‘‘byāsattamanasaṁ kulaṁ, byāsattamanāni kulāni. Byāsattamanasaṁ
anya-e0803n5:269_1: kulaṁ, byāsattamanāni kulāni. Byāsattamanasā kulenā’’tiādinā nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n5:269_3: sāgamo bhavati ādesasaravibhattisaraparattā, ayampi nayo sukhumo sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbo.
anya-e0803n5:270_0: Itthiliṅge pana vattabbe ‘‘byāsattamanasā itthī’’ti evaṁ paṭhamekavacanaṭṭhāneyeva
anya-e0803n5:270_1: sāgamaṁ vatvā tato ‘‘byāsattamanā, byāsattamanāyo itthiyo. Byāsattamanaṁ itthi’’nti
anya-e0803n5:270_2: kaññānayena yojetabbā. ‘‘Evaṁ saddheyyavacasā upāsikā, saddheyyavacāyo upāsikāyo.
anya-e0803n5:270_4: pana cittakaññānayena yojetabbā. Ettha pana sabbathāpi sāgamo natthi.
anya-e0803n5:271_0: Sotūnaṁ ñāṇappabhedajananatthaṁ aparāpi nāmikapadamālāyo dassayissāma sahanibbacanena
anya-e0803n5:271_1: – mano eva mānasaṁ, samussāhitaṁ mānasaṁ yassa soyaṁ samussāhitamānaso. ‘‘Samussāhitamānaso,
anya-e0803n5:271_3: purisanayena yojetabbā. Sundarā medhā assa atthīti sumedhaso. ‘‘Sumedhaso, sumedhasā.
anya-e0803n5:271_4: Sumedhasaṁ, sumedhase. Sumedhasenā’’ti purisanayena, evaṁ ‘‘bhūrimedhaso’’tiādīnampi. Tatrime payogā –
anya-e0803n5:273: Kiṁ nu tamhā vippavasi, muhuttamapi piṅgiya;
anya-e0803n5:277_0: Itthiliṅge vattabbe ‘‘samussāhitamānasā sumedhasā’’ti rūpāni, napuṁsake vattabbe
anya-e0803n5:277_1: ‘‘samussāhitamānasaṁ sumedhasa’’nti rūpāni, kaññā cittanayena etesaṁ padamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n5:277_2: Okārantapulliṅgaṭṭhāne itthiliṅgādivinicchayo nayappakāsanatthaṁ kato. Visesato hi
anya-e0803n5:277_3: okārantakathāyeva idhādhippetā. Apica loke nīti nāma nānappakārehi kathitā eva sobhati,
anya-e0803n5:277_4: ayañca sāsane nīti, tasmā nānappakārehi kathitāti.
anya-e0803n5:280: Viseso tesu kesañci, pāḷiyaṁ yo padissati;
anya-e0803n5:286_0: Tatra kānici suttapadāni dassessāma – natthi attakāre, natthi parakāre, natthi purisakāre,
anya-e0803n5:286_1: pariyantakate saṁsāre, jīve sattame, na hevaṁ vattabbe, bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā
anya-e0803n5:286_2: saṁsaritvā dukkhassantaṁ karissantīti. Imāni ekavacanabahuvacanavasena dvidhā gahetabbāni.
anya-e0803n5:287_0: Ye pana ‘‘vanappagumbeti paccattavacanassa bhummavacananiddeso’’ti vadanti, te vattabbā
anya-e0803n5:287_2: odanaṁ pacatī’ti ettha viya ādhārasutisambhavato ‘gimhāna māse paṭhamasmiṁ gimhe’ti
anya-e0803n5:287_3: idaṁ kataratthaṁ jotetī’’ti? Te vadeyyuṁ ‘‘na mayaṁ bho ‘vanappagumbeti idaṁ bhummavacana’nti
anya-e0803n5:287_4: vadāma, atha kho ‘paccattavacanassa bhummavacananiddeso’ti vadāmā’’ti. Evampi dosoyeva
anya-e0803n5:287_5: tumhākaṁ, nanu ‘‘saṅghe gotami dehī’’ti etthāpi sampadānavacanassa bhummavacananiddesoti
anya-e0803n5:287_6: vuttepi saṅghassa dānakriyāya ādhārabhāvato ‘‘saṅghe’’ti vacanaṁ suṇantānaṁ ādhārasuti
anya-e0803n5:287_7: ca ādhāraparikappo ca hotiyeva. Na hi sakkā evaṁ pavattaṁ cittaṁ nivāretuṁ, tasmā
anya-e0803n5:287_8: ettha evaṁ pana viseso gahetabbo ‘‘paccattavacanassapi katthaci bhummavacanassa viya
anya-e0803n5:287_9: rūpaṁ hotī’’ti. Evañhi gahite na koci virodho. Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu niruttippabhedakusalo
anya-e0803n5:287_10: lokānukampako bhagavā paccattavacanavasena niddisitabbe sati evaṁ aniddisitvā lokassa
anya-e0803n5:287_11: sammohamuppādayanto viya kathaṁ bhummavacananiddesaṁ karissati, tasmā saddasāmaññalesamattaṁ
anya-e0803n5:287_12: gahetvā ‘‘bhummavacananiddeso’’ti na vattabbaṁ. Yadi saddasāmaññaṁ gahetvā bhummavacananiddesaṁ
anya-e0803n5:288_0: Apica tatheva ‘‘attakāre’’ti paccattavacanassa bhummavacananiddese sati ādhārasutisambhavato
anya-e0803n5:288_1: ‘‘attakārasmiṁ kiñci vatthu natthī’’ti anadhippeto attho siyā, na pana ‘‘attakāro
anya-e0803n5:288_3: natthisaddena avattabbattā dosoyeva siyā, atthisaddādīnaṁ viya pana natthisaddassapi
anya-e0803n5:288_4: paṭhamāya yogato ‘‘attakāre’’ti idaṁ paccattavacanamevāti viññāyati. ‘‘Bāle ca paṇḍite
anya-e0803n5:288_5: ca sandhāvitvā saṁsaritvā dukkhassantaṁ karissantī’’ti etthāpi paccattavacanassa
anya-e0803n5:288_7: paṇḍitā cā’’ti ettakampi vattuṁ ajānanadoso siyā, ‘‘karissantī’’ti padayogato pana
anya-e0803n5:288_8: ‘‘bāle cā’’tiādi paccattavacanamevāti viññāyati. Yathā pana niggahītāgamavasenuccārite
anya-e0803n5:288_9: ‘‘cakkhuṁ udapādī’’ti pade paccattavacanassa ‘‘cakkhuṁ me dehi yācito’’ti ettha upayogavacanena
anya-e0803n5:288_12: avacanīyattā, ‘‘cakkhuṁ udapādī’’ti hi bhagavatā vuttakāle ko ‘‘cakkhuṁ udapādī’’ti
anya-e0803n5:288_13: padaṁ parivattitvā atthamācikkhati, tathā ‘‘bāle paṇḍite’’tiādīnampi paccattavacanānaṁ
anya-e0803n5:288_14: aparehi ‘‘bāle paṇḍite’’tiādīhi bhummopayogavacanehi sutivasena samānattepi paccattavacanatthoyeva
anya-e0803n5:288_15: sotāre paṭibhāti, na itaravacanattho yathāpayogaṁ atthassa gahetabbattā. Iti ‘‘vanappagumbe,
anya-e0803n5:288_16: bāle, paṇḍite’’tiādīnaṁ suddhapaccattavacanattaññeva sārato paccetabbaṁ, na sutisāmaññena
anya-e0803n5:294_0: Imassa kāmanītajātakassa saṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ ‘‘kekake cāti paccatte upayogavacanaṁ, tena
anya-e0803n5:294_1: kekakassa raṭṭhaṁ dassetī’’ti vuttaṁ. Evaṁ vadanto ca so ‘‘purise passati, purise
anya-e0803n5:294_2: patiṭṭhita’’nti, ‘‘passāmi loke sadhane manusse’’ti ca ādīsu yebhuyyena ‘‘purise,
anya-e0803n5:294_5: tādisamevā’’ti maññamāno vadati maññe. Ācariyā hi katthaci attano ruciyāpi visuṁ
anya-e0803n5:294_6: visuṁ kathenti. Ayaṁ pana amhākaṁ ruci – ‘‘kekake’’ti idaṁ paccattavacanameva ‘‘pañcālā,
anya-e0803n5:294_7: kuruyo’’ti sahajātapadāni viya, raṭṭhavācakattā pana ‘‘kuruyo’’ti padamiva bahuvacanavasena
anya-e0803n5:294_8: vuttaṁ. Na hi bhagavā ‘‘khattiyo, brāhmaṇo, vesso’’tiādīsu viya samānavibhattīhi
anya-e0803n5:294_9: niddisitabbesu sahajātapadesu pacchimaṁ upayogavacanavasena niddiseyya, yutti ca
anya-e0803n5:294_11: vacane, tasmā ‘‘kekake’’ti idaṁ paccattavacanameva. Tathā hi sandhivisodhanavidhāyako
anya-e0803n5:294_12: ācariyo tādisānaṁ padānaṁ paccattavacanattaññeva vibhāvento sāmaṁ kate pakaraṇe ‘‘vanappagumbo
anya-e0803n5:294_13: vanappagumbe, sukhaṁ dukkhaṁ jīvo, sukhe dukkhe jīve’’ti āha, ṭīkāyampi ca tesaṁ
anya-e0803n5:294_14: paccattavacanabhāvameva vibhāvento ‘‘vanappagumbo, sukhaṁ, dukkhaṁ, jīvo’’ti sādhanīyaṁ
anya-e0803n5:294_16: sukhe, dukkhe, jīve’’ti rūpanipphattimāha. Sā pāḷinayānu kūlā. Kaccāyanācariyenapi
anya-e0803n5:294_17: pāḷinayaṁ nissāya ‘‘dvipade tulyādhikaraṇe’’ti paccattabahuvacanapadaṁ vuttaṁ. Tenāha
anya-e0803n5:294_18: vuttiyaṁ ‘‘dve padāni tulyādhikaraṇānī’’ti. ‘‘Dvipade tulyādhikaraṇe’’ti ca idaṁ
anya-e0803n5:294_19: ‘‘aṭṭha nāgāvāsasatānī’’ti vattabbe ‘‘aṭṭha nāgāvāsasate’’ti padamiva vuccatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:295_0: Keci pana tesaṁ bhummekavacanattaṁ icchanti. Tattha yadi ‘‘vanappagumbe’’ti paccatte
anya-e0803n5:295_1: bhummavacanaṁ, ‘‘kekake’’ti ca paccatte upayogavacanaṁ, ‘‘esese eke ekaṭṭhe’’ti ettha
anya-e0803n5:295_2: ‘‘esese’’ti imānipi paccatte bhummavacanāni vā siyuṁ, upayogavacanāni vā. Yathetāni
anya-e0803n5:295_3: evaṁvidhāni na honti, suddhapaccattavacanāniyeva honti, tathā ‘‘vanappagumbe, kekake’’tiādīnipi
anya-e0803n5:295_4: tathāvidhāni na honti, suddhapaccattavacanāniyeva honti. Iccevaṁ sabbathāpi ‘‘vanappagumbe,
anya-e0803n5:295_5: bāle, paṇḍite, kekake’’ti, ‘‘viratte kosiyāyane, aṭṭha nāgāvāsasate, ke purise, esese’’ti
anya-e0803n5:295_8: bhavatīti avassamidaṁ sampaṭicchitabbaṁ. Evaṁ ‘‘vanappagumbe, bāle, paṇḍite’’tiādīnaṁ
anya-e0803n5:295_9: suddhapaccattavacanatā atīva sukhumā dubbiññeyyā, saddhena kulaputtena ācariye payirupāsitvā
anya-e0803n5:295_10: tadupadesaṁ sakkaccaṁ gahetvā jānitabbā. Buddhavacanasmiñhi saddato ca atthato ca
anya-e0803n5:295_11: adhippāyato ca akkharacintakānaṁ ñāṇacakkhusammuyhanaṭṭhānabhūtā pāḷinayā vividhā dissanti.
anya-e0803n5:296_0: Tattha saddato tāva idaṁ sammuyhanaṭṭhānaṁ – ‘‘virattā kosiyāyanī’’ti vattabbe ‘‘viratte
anya-e0803n5:296_1: kosiyāyane’’ti itthiliṅgapaccattavacanaṁ dissati, ‘‘ko puriso’’ti vattabbe ‘‘ke purise’’ti
anya-e0803n5:296_3: te upajjhāyo’’ti samāsapadaṁ pulliṅgavisayaṁ dissati. Kiṁ nāmaṁ etassāti konāmoti
anya-e0803n5:296_4: hi samāso. Tena ‘‘konāmā itthī, konāmaṁ kula’’nti ayampi nayo gahetabbo. ‘‘Kva te
anya-e0803n5:296_5: balaṁ mahārājā’’ti vattabbe ‘‘ko te balaṁ mahārājā’’ti ettha kvasaddena īsakaṁ samānasutiko
anya-e0803n5:296_6: sattamiyanto kosaddo dissati, kva kosaddā hi aññamaññamīsakasamānasutikā. Tathā ‘‘idha
anya-e0803n5:296_7: hemantagimhesu, idha hemantagimhisu, na tenatthaṁ abandhi so, na tenatthaṁ abandhisū’’ti
anya-e0803n5:297_0: Atthato pana idaṁ sammuyhanaṭṭhānaṁ – ‘‘yaṁ na kañcanadvepiñcha, andhena tamasā gata’’nti
anya-e0803n5:297_1: ettha nakāro ‘‘kata’’nti iminā sambandhitabbo. Na katanti kataṁ viyāti attho. Ettha
anya-e0803n5:297_2: hi nakāro upamāne vattati, na paṭisedhe.
anya-e0803n5:303_0: Adhippāyato idaṁ sammuyhanaṭṭhānaṁ – ‘‘taṇhaṁ asmimānaṁ sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyo dvādasāyatananissitaṁ
anya-e0803n5:303_1: nandirāgañca hantvā brāhmaṇo anīgho yātī’’ti vattabbepi tathā avatvā tamevatthaṁ
anya-e0803n5:304: ‘‘Mātaraṁ pitaraṁ hantvā, rājāno dve ca khattiye;
anya-e0803n5:305: Raṭṭhaṁ sānucaraṁ hantvā, anīgho yāti brāhmaṇo’’ti
anya-e0803n5:307: ‘‘Vanaṁ chindatha mā rukkhaṁ, vanato jāyate bhayaṁ;
anya-e0803n5:308: Chetvā vanañca vanathaṁ, nibbanā hotha bhikkhavo’’ti
anya-e0803n5:309: Evamādīnipi aññāni yojetabbāni. Evaṁ buddhavacane saddato ca atthato ca adhippāyato ca akkharacintakānaṁ ñāṇacakkhusammuyhanaṭṭhānabhūtā pāḷinayā vividhā dissanti. Yathāha –
anya-e0803n5:311: Yebhuyyena hi lokanītividhurā pāṭhe nayā vijjare;
anya-e0803n5:312: Paṇḍiccampi pahāya bāhiragataṁ ettheva tasmā budho,
anya-e0803n5:314_0: Evaṁ pāḷinayānaṁ dubbiññeyyattā ‘‘vanappagumbe, bāle ca, paṇḍite cā’’tiādīnaṁ suddhapaccattavacanattaññeva
anya-e0803n5:314_1: sārato paccetabbaṁ, na sutisāmaññena bhummopayogavacanattaṁ bhummopayogavacanehi
anya-e0803n5:314_2: tesaṁ samānasutikattepi paccattajotakattā. Samānasutikāpi hi saddā atthappakaraṇaliṅgasaddantarābhisambandhādivasena
anya-e0803n5:314_3: atthavisesajotakā bhavanti. Taṁ yathā? ‘‘Sīho gāyatī’’ti vutte ‘‘evaṁnāmako puriso’’ti
anya-e0803n5:314_4: attho viññāyati. ‘‘Sīho naṅguṭṭhaṁ cāletī’’ti vutte pana ‘‘migarājā’’ti viññāyati.
anya-e0803n5:314_5: Evaṁ atthavasena samānasutikānaṁ atthavisesajotanaṁ bhavati. Saṅgāme ṭhatvā ‘‘sindhavamānehī’’ti
anya-e0803n5:314_7: viññāyati. Evaṁ pakaraṇavasena samānasutikānaṁ atthavisesajotanaṁ bhavati. ‘‘Issā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:314_9: viññāyati. Evaṁ liṅgavasena ekadesasamānasutikānaṁ atthavisesajotanaṁ bhavati. Ettha
anya-e0803n5:314_10: pana kiñcāpi ‘‘devadattaṁ pakkosa ghaṭadhārakaṁ daṇḍadhāraka’’ntiādīsupi ghaṭadaṇḍādīni
anya-e0803n5:314_11: liṅgaṁ, tathāpi samānasutikādhikārattā na taṁ idhādhippetaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:315_0: ‘‘Issā uppajjatī’’ti ca ‘‘issā purisamanubandhiṁsū’’ti ca vutte pana sabbathā samānasutikānaṁ
anya-e0803n5:315_2: migarājā sāyanhasamayaṁ āsayā nikkhamatī’’ti vutte ‘‘migādhipo kesarasīho’’ti viññāyati.
anya-e0803n5:315_3: ‘‘Sīho samaṇuddeso, sīho senāpatī’’ti ca vutte pana ‘‘sīho nāma sāmaṇero, sīho nāma
anya-e0803n5:315_4: senāpatī’’ti viññāyati. Evampi saddantarābhisambandhavasena samānasutikānaṁ atthavisesajotanaṁ
anya-e0803n5:315_5: bhavati. ‘‘Addasaṁsu kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū vihāraṁ paṭisaṅkharonte’’ti
anya-e0803n5:315_7: bhavati. Tathā ‘‘siñca bhikkhu imaṁ nāvaṁ, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavocā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:315_9: bhavati, tasmā ‘‘vanappagumbe yatha phussitagge’’tiādīni bhummopayogavacanehi sadisattepisaddantarābhisambandhavasena
anya-e0803n5:315_10: suddhapaccattavacanānīti gahetabbāni. Paccattekavacanabahuvacanānaṁ eva hi ekārādesavasena
anya-e0803n5:315_11: evaṁvidhāni rūpāni bhavanti bhummopayogavacanāni viyāti. Nanu ca bho evaṁvidhānaṁ
anya-e0803n5:315_12: rūpānaṁ pāḷiyaṁ dissanato ‘ekārantampi pulliṅgaṁ atthī’ti vattabbanti? Na vattabbaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:315_13: okārantabhāvogadharūpavisesattā tesaṁ rūpānaṁ. Ādesavasena hi siddhattā visuṁ ekārantapulliṅgaṁ
anya-e0803n5:315_14: nāma natthi, tasmā pulliṅgānaṁ yathāvuttasattavidhatāyeva gahetabbāti.
anya-e0803n5:316_0: Keci pana vadeyyuṁ ‘‘yāyaṁ purisasaddanayaṁ gahetvā ‘bhūto, bhūtā. Bhūta’ntiādinā
anya-e0803n5:316_1: sabbesamokārantapadānaṁ nāmikapadamālā vibhattā, tattha catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni
anya-e0803n5:316_2: rūpāni kimatthaṁ na vuttānī’’ti? Visesadassanatthaṁ. Tādisāni hi catutthekavacanarūpāni
anya-e0803n5:316_4: vibhattivipariṇāme, tadatthe cā’’ti saṅkhepato imesu catūsuyeva ṭhānesu, pabhedato
anya-e0803n5:316_5: pana sattasu ṭhānesu dissanti. Dānarocanadhāraṇanamoyogādibhede pana yattha katthaci
anya-e0803n5:316_6: sampadānavisaye na dissanti, iti imaṁ visesaṁ dassetuṁ na vuttānīti. Nanu dānakriyāyoge
anya-e0803n5:316_8: saddanītippakaraṇe ‘‘purisāya, bhūtāyā’’tiādīni vattabbāni, evaṁ sante kasmā ‘‘dānarocanadhāraṇanamoyogādibhede
anya-e0803n5:316_9: pana yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye na dissantī’’ti vuttanti? Apāḷinayattā. ‘‘Abhirūpāya
anya-e0803n5:316_10: kaññā deyyā’’ti ayañhi saddasatthato āgato nayo, na buddhavacanato. Buddhavacanañhi
anya-e0803n5:316_11: patvā ‘‘abhirūpassa kaññā deyyā’’ti padarūpaṁ bhavissatīti. Nanu ca bho namoyogādīsupi
anya-e0803n5:316_12: catutthekavacanassa āyādeso dissatīti. Sāsanāvacarāpi hi nipuṇā paṇḍitā ‘‘namo buddhāyā’’tiādīni
anya-e0803n5:323_0: ‘‘Naro naraṁ yācati kiñci vatthuṁ, narena dūto pahito narāyā’’ti ca gāthāracanampi
anya-e0803n5:323_1: kubbantīti? Saccaṁ, sāsanāvacarāpi nipuṇā paṇḍitā ‘‘namo buddhāyā’’tiādīnivatvā ratanattayaṁ
anya-e0803n5:323_2: vandanti, gāthāracanampi kubbanti, evaṁ santepi te saddasatthe kataparicayavasena
anya-e0803n5:323_3: saddasatthato nayaṁ gahetvā tathārūpā gāthāpi cuṇṇiyapadānipi abhisaṅkharonti, ‘‘namo
anya-e0803n5:323_4: buddhāyā’’tiādīni vatvā ratanattayaṁ vandanti. Ye pana saddasatthe akataparicayā
anya-e0803n5:323_5: antamaso bāladārakā, tepi aññesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā kataparicayavasena ‘‘namo buddhāyā’’tiādīni
anya-e0803n5:323_6: vatvā ratanattayaṁ vandanti, ‘‘namo buddhassā’’ti vadantā pana appakatarā. Katthaci
anya-e0803n5:323_7: hi padese kumārake akkharasamayaṁ uggaṇhāpentā garū akkharānamādimhi ‘‘namo buddhāyā’’ti
