anya-e0803n5:323_8: sikkhāpenti, na pana ‘‘namo buddhassā’’ti, evaṁ santepi pāḷinaye porāṇaṭṭhakathānaye
anya-e0803n5:323_9: ca upaparikkhiyamāne ṭhapetvā gatyatthakammādiṭṭhānacatukkaṁ, pabhedato sattaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0803n5:323_10: vā dānarocanadhāraṇanamoyogādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye catutthekavacanassa
anya-e0803n5:323_11: āyādesasahitāni rūpāni na dissanti, tasmā kehici abhisaṅkhatāni ‘‘namo buddhāya,
anya-e0803n5:323_12: buddhāya dānaṁ dentī’’ti padāni pāḷiṁ patvā ‘‘namo buddhassa, buddhassa dānaṁ dentī’’ti
anya-e0803n5:323_13: aññarūpāni bhavantīti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Ayaṁ pana pāḷinayaaṭṭhakathānayānurūpena āyādesassa
anya-e0803n5:323_14: payogaracanā – ‘‘buddhāya saraṇaṁ gacchati, buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchatī’’ti vā, ‘‘buddhāya
anya-e0803n5:323_15: nagaraṁ nenti, buddhaṁ nagaraṁ nentī’’ti vā, ‘‘buddhāya sakkato dhammo, buddhena
anya-e0803n5:323_16: sakkato dhammo’’ti vā, ‘‘buddhāya jīvitaṁ pariccajati, buddhassa atthāya jīvitaṁ
anya-e0803n5:323_17: pariccajatī’’ti vā, ‘‘buddhāya apenti aññatitthiyā, buddhasmā apenti aññatitthiyā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:323_18: vā , ‘‘buddhāya dhammatā, buddhassa dhammatā’’ti vā, ‘‘buddhāya pasanno, buddhe pasanno’’ti
anya-e0803n5:323_19: vā iti pabhedato imaṁ sattaṭhānaṁ vivajjetvā aññattha āyādeso na dissati. Tathā hi –
anya-e0803n5:326_0: Ettha mahānamakkārapāṭho nāma ‘‘namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:326_1: pāṭho. Atrāpi āyādeso na dissati. Vammikasuttepi ‘‘namo karohi nāgassā’’ti evaṁ āyādeso
anya-e0803n5:326_2: na dissati. Ambaṭṭhasuttepi ‘‘sotthi bhadante hotu rañño, sotthi janapadassa’’. Evaṁ āyādeso na dissati.
anya-e0803n5:331: Yesaṁ divā ca ratto ca, niccaṁ buddhagatā satī’’ti
anya-e0803n5:332_0: Imissā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘sammādiṭṭhikassa putto guḷaṁ khipamāno buddhānussatiṁ
anya-e0803n5:332_1: āvajjetvā ‘namo buddhassā’ti vatvā guḷaṁ khipatī’’ti āyādesavajjito saddaracanāviseso
anya-e0803n5:332_3: khipitvāpi kāsetvāpi ‘namo buddhassā’ti tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa namakkāraṁ karosī’’ti
anya-e0803n5:332_4: āyādesavajjito saddaracanāviseso dissati. Tathā tattha tattha ‘‘buddhappamukhassa
anya-e0803n5:332_5: bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṁ deti. Tassa purisassa bhattaṁ na ruccati. Samaṇassa rocate
anya-e0803n5:332_6: saccaṁ, buddhassa chattaṁ dhāreti, buddhassa silāghate’’tiādinā āyādesavivajjito
anya-e0803n5:332_7: saddaracanāviseso dissati. Evaṁ dānarocanādīsu bahūsu sampadānavisayesu catutthekavacanassa
anya-e0803n5:333_0: Gatyatthakammādīsu pana catūsu ṭhānesu dissati. Tathā hi ‘‘mūlāya paṭikasseyya, appo
anya-e0803n5:333_1: saggāya gacchatī’’ti cettha gatyatthakammani dissati. Ettha hi ‘‘mūlaṁ paṭikasseyya,
anya-e0803n5:333_2: appo saggaṁ gacchatī’’ti ca attho. ‘‘Paṭikasseyyā’’ti cettha kasa gatiyanti dhātussa
anya-e0803n5:333_3: patiupasaggena visesitattā ‘‘ākaḍḍheyyā’’ti attho bhavati. ‘‘Ayaṁ puriso mama atthakāmo,
anya-e0803n5:333_4: yo maṁ gahetvāna dakāya netī’’ti ettha nayanatthakammani dissati. Ettha hi maṁ udakaṁ
anya-e0803n5:333_5: neti, attano vasanakasobbhaṁ pāpetīti attho. ‘‘Viramathāyasmanto mama vacanāyā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:333_6: ettha vibhattivipariṇāme dissati. Mama vacanato viramathāti hi nissakkavacanavasena
anya-e0803n5:333_7: attho. ‘‘Mahāgaṇāya bhattā me’’ti etthāpi vibhattivipariṇāme dissati. Mama mahato
anya-e0803n5:333_8: haṁsagaṇassa bhattāti hi sāmivacanavasena attho. Mama haṁsarājāti cettha adhippāyo.
anya-e0803n5:333_9: ‘‘Asakkatā casma dhanañcayāyā’’ti etthāpi vibhattivipariṇāme dissati. Mayaṁ dhanañcayassa
anya-e0803n5:333_10: rañño asakkatā ca bhavāmāti hi kattutthe sāmivacanaṁ. Tathā hi ‘‘dhanañcayassā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:333_11: vā ‘‘dhanañcayenā’’ti vā vattabbe evaṁ avatvā ‘‘dhanañcayāyā’’ti sampadānavacanaṁ
anya-e0803n5:333_12: dānakriyādikassa sampadānavisayassa abhāvato vibhattivipariṇāmeyeva yujjati, tasmā
anya-e0803n5:333_13: dhanañcayarājena mayaṁ asakkatā ca bhavāmāti attho gahetabbo. Aññampi vibhattivipariṇāmaṭṭhānaṁ maggitabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:334_0: ‘‘Virāgāya upasamāya nirodhāyā’’tiādīni pana anekasahassāni āyādesasahitāni saddarūpāni
anya-e0803n5:334_1: tadatthe pavattanti. Aṭṭhakathācariyāpi hi dhammavinayasaddatthaṁ vaṇṇentā ‘‘dhammānaṁ
anya-e0803n5:334_2: vinayāya. Anavajjadhammatthañhesa vinayo, na bhavabhogādiattha’’nti tadatthavaseneva
anya-e0803n5:334_3: āyādesasahitaṁ saddarūpaṁ payuñjiṁsu, evaṁ catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni rūpāni
anya-e0803n5:334_4: gatyatthakammani nayanatthakammani vibhattivipariṇāme tadatthe cāti imesu catūsuyeva
anya-e0803n5:334_5: ṭhānesu dissanti, na pana dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye. Tathā
anya-e0803n5:334_6: hi niruttipiṭake ‘‘atthāyāti sampadānavacana’’nti āyādesasahitaṁ saddarūpaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:334_7: purisasaddādivasena pana tādisāni rūpāni na vuttāni tādisānaṁ saddarūpānaṁ yattha
anya-e0803n5:334_8: katthaci appavattanato. Kaccāyanappakaraṇepi hi ‘‘āya catutthekavacanassa tū’’ti
anya-e0803n5:334_9: lakkhaṇassa vuttiyaṁ ‘‘atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussāna’’nti vuttaṁ. ‘‘Purisāyā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:335_0: Ettha siyā – nanu bho tasseva vuttiyaṁ ‘‘catutthīti kimatthaṁ purisassa mukhaṁ. Ekavacanassāti
anya-e0803n5:335_1: kimatthaṁ purisānaṁ dadāti. Vāti kimatthaṁ dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:335_2: vuttattā ‘‘purisāya samaṇāya brāhmaṇāyā’’tiādīni padarūpāni nayato dassitāni, kevalaṁ
anya-e0803n5:335_3: pana mukhasaddayogato bahuvacanabhāvato vikappanato ca ‘‘purisāyā’’tiādīni na sijjhanti,
anya-e0803n5:335_4: mukhasaddayogādivirahite pana ṭhāne avassaṁ sijjhantīti? Ettha vuccate – ‘‘catutthīti
anya-e0803n5:335_5: kimatthaṁ purisassa mukha’’nti vadanto ‘‘sace āyādeso bhaveyya , catutthiyā eva bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:335_6: na chaṭṭhiyā’’ti dassento ‘‘mukha’’nti padaṁ dassesi, na ca tena ‘‘mukhasaddaṭṭhāne
anya-e0803n5:335_7: detītiādike sampadānavisayabhūte kriyāpade ṭhite āyādeso hotī’’ti dasseti. ‘‘Ekavacanassāti
anya-e0803n5:335_8: kimatthaṁ purisānaṁ dadātī’’ti vadantopi ‘‘ekavacanasseva āyādeso hoti, na bahuvacanassā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:335_9: dasseti. ‘‘Dadātī’’ti idaṁ padaṁ ‘‘purisāna’’nti padassa sampadānavacanattaṁ ñāpetuṁ
anya-e0803n5:335_10: avoca, na ca ‘‘detītiādike sampadānavisayabhūte kriyāpade sati catutthekavacanassa
anya-e0803n5:335_11: āyādeso hotī’’ti imamatthaṁ viññāpeti. ‘‘Vāti kimatthaṁ dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa
anya-e0803n5:335_12: vā’’ti ca vadantopi ‘‘sampadāneyeva vikappena āyādeso hotī’’ti viññāpeti, na dānādikriyaṁ
anya-e0803n5:336_0: Yadi pana dānādikriyaṁ paṭicca āyādesavidhānaṁ siyā, vuttikārakena lakkhaṇassa vuttiyaṁ
anya-e0803n5:336_2: vattabbaṁ siyā, na ca vuttaṁ. Kasmāti ce? Buddhavacane porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu ca tādisassa
anya-e0803n5:336_3: payogassa abhāvā. Niruttipiṭake hi pabhinnapaṭisambhido so āyasmā mahākaccāno ‘‘purisassa
anya-e0803n5:336_4: dīyate’’ti āyādesarahitāniyeva rūpāni dasseti, ‘‘atthāyāti sampadānavacana’’nti bhaṇantopi
anya-e0803n5:336_5: ca thero dānādikriyāpekkhaṁ akatvā catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitaṁ rūpameva niddisi.
anya-e0803n5:336_6: Tena so payogo tadatthappayogoti viññāyati. Iti imehi kāraṇehi jānitabbaṁ ‘‘dānādikriyaṁ
anya-e0803n5:336_7: paṭicca āyādesavidhānaṁ na kata’’nti. Yajjevaṁ ‘‘atthāya hitāyā’’tiādīniyeva tadatthappayogāni
anya-e0803n5:336_8: ‘‘āya catutthekavacanassa tū’’ti lakkhaṇassa visayā bhaveyyuṁ, nāññānīti? Tanna,
anya-e0803n5:336_9: aññānipi visayāyeva tassa. Katamāni? ‘‘Mūlāya paṭikasseyya, appo saggāya gacchati,
anya-e0803n5:336_10: dakāya neti, viramathāyasmanto mamavacanāya, gaṇāya bhattā’’tiādīni. ‘‘Saggassa gamanena
anya-e0803n5:337_0: Nanu ca bho evaṁ sante vuttikārakena mūlodāharaṇesu ‘‘atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussāna’’nti
anya-e0803n5:337_1: vatvā ‘‘mūlāya paṭikasseyyā’’tiādīnipi vattabbāni, kimudāharaṇe pana ‘‘vāti kimatthaṁ
anya-e0803n5:337_2: saggassa gamanena vā’’ti vattabbanti? Saccaṁ, avacane kāraṇamatthi, taṁ suṇātha –
anya-e0803n5:337_3: ‘‘mūlāya paṭikasseyya, appo saggāya gacchatī’’ti ettha hi ‘‘mūlāya, saggāyā’’ti padāni
anya-e0803n5:337_4: suddhasampadānavacanāni na honti gatyatthakammani vattanato, tasmā mūlodāharaṇesu
anya-e0803n5:337_5: na vuttāni. Tathā ‘‘dakāya netī’’ti ettha ‘‘dakāyā’’ti padaṁ nayanatthakammani vattanato
anya-e0803n5:337_6: suddhasampadānavacanaṁ na hotīti na vuttaṁ. ‘‘Viramathāyasmanto mama vacanāyā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:337_7: ettha pana ‘‘vacanāyā’’ti padaṁ nissakkavacanatthe vattanato, ‘‘gaṇāya bhattā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:337_8: ettha ‘‘gaṇāyā’’ti padaṁ sāmivacanatthe vattanato, ‘‘asakkatā casma dhanañcayāyā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:337_9: ettha ‘‘dhanañcayāyā’’ti padaṁ kattuvasena sāmiatthe vattanato suddhasampadānavacanaṁ
anya-e0803n5:337_10: na hotīti na vuttaṁ. Kimudāharaṇepi ‘‘saggassā’’ti padaṁ gamanasaddasannidhānato
anya-e0803n5:337_11: gatyatthakammani vattanato suddhasampadānavacanaṁ na hotīti ‘‘vāti kimatthaṁ saggassa
anya-e0803n5:337_12: gamanena vā’’ti na vuttaṁ. Evañhettha vuttanayena buddhavacanaṁ porāṇaṭṭhakathānayañca
anya-e0803n5:337_13: patvā catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni rūpāni gatyatthakammādīsu catūsuyeva ṭhānesu
anya-e0803n5:337_14: dissanti, na pana dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisayeti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:338_0: Nanu ca bho ‘‘candanasāraṁ jeṭṭhikāya adāsi suvaṇṇamālaṁ kaniṭṭhāyā’’ti dānappayoge
anya-e0803n5:338_2: ruccati alaṅkāro, rājakaññāya chattaṁ dhāreti, rājakaññāya namo karohi, rājakaññāya
anya-e0803n5:338_3: sotthi bhavatu, rājakaññāya silāghate’’tiādīhipi payogehi bhavitabbaṁ, atha kasmā
anya-e0803n5:338_5: rūpāni gatyatthakammādīsu catūsuyeva ṭhānesu dissanti, na pana dānarocanādibhede
anya-e0803n5:338_6: yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye’’ti vadathāti? Uppathamavatiṇṇo bhavaṁ, na hi bhavaṁ
anya-e0803n5:338_7: amhākaṁ vacanatthaṁ jānāti. Ayañhettha amhākaṁ vacanattho – sabbānipi itthiliṅgāni
anya-e0803n5:338_9: asamāni, tasmā tāni ṭhapetvā pulliṅganapuṁsakaliṅgesu purisādi cittādisaddānaṁ akārantapakatibhāve
anya-e0803n5:338_10: ṭhitānaṁ catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni rūpāni buddhavacanādīsu dānarocanādibhede
anya-e0803n5:338_11: yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye na dissanti. Teneva hi ‘‘mūlāya, saggāya, dakāya,
anya-e0803n5:338_12: vacanāya, gaṇāyā’’tiādīni gatyatthakammādīsu tīsu ‘‘abhiññāya, sambodhāya, nibbānāyā’’ti
anya-e0803n5:338_13: evamādīni pana anekasatāni tiliṅgapadāni tadattheyevāti imesu catūsu ṭhānesu dissanti.
anya-e0803n5:338_14: ‘‘Deti, rocati, dhāretī’’tiādīsu pana suddhasampadānavisayesu na dissanti. Bhavanti catra –
anya-e0803n5:361: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
